[THYMEWARP]
Thyme Warp

[THYMEWARP_DESCRIPTION]
{KEYWORD}Usage: {STAT}single use, instant
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}zombies teleported back also restore health
{KEYWORD}Plant features: {STAT}green plant
{FLAVOR}"Ytilaitilibissop rehto tpecca deen ew," Thyme Warp says, "detimil saw emit fo ytilanoitceridinu eht taht tlef syawla ev'I."

[THYMEWARP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
Thyme Warps rewind time, sending zombies back where they started.

[THYMEWARP_TOOLTIP]
Thyme Warps rewind time, sending zombies back where they started.

[THYMEWARP_PRODUCT_SHORT_DESC]
Thyme Warps rewind time, sending zombies back where they started.

[THYMEWARP_SKILL_LEVEL1]
Time-Space Turbulence

[THYMEWARP_SKILL_LEVEL1_DES]
60% chance to destroy any teleported zombie.

[THYMEWARP_SKILL_LEVEL2]
Time-Space Grasp

[THYMEWARP_SKILL_LEVEL2_DES]
Can teleport up to 7 zombies at once and may destroy some of them instantly.

[THYMEWARP_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL1_DES]
Inverse time grass that masters the power of time and space will cause the five enemy zombies on the far left side of the field to disappear within 2.5 seconds after planting, and will appear on the far right side of the row after 3 seconds. The fully manifested zombies will clear their abnormal state (except for shrinking) and restore their health to full value. The teleported zombies are unable to move throughout the process.

[THYMEWARP_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL2_DES]
60% chance to destroy any teleported zombie.

[THYMEWARP_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL3_DES]
Can teleport up to 7 zombies at once and may destroy some of them instantly.

[THYMEWARP_PLANTFOOD_DESCRIPTION]
This plant does not have an plants food effect 

[THYMEWARP_AVATAR_PLANTFOOD_DESCRIPTION]
This plant does not have an plants food effect 

[GENE_DESCRIPTION_THYMEWARP]
Planting colddown reduced by {Param_1}%

[STORE_PRODUCT_AVATAR_THYMEWARP]
Recharge reduced by 20%.

[STORE_PRODUCT_AVATAR_THYMEWARP_TITLE]
Counter-timesgrass costume





[ALOES]
Aloe

[ALOES_DESCRIPTION]
{KEYWORD}Plant features: {STAT} green plant
{FLAVOR} aloe vera wanders around major cosmetics new product launches and takes the opportunity to promote her product aloe vera water. This year, the entire skin care product market is talking about whitening, which is the strength of aloe vera.

[ALOES_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
It can purify the poison mist of perfumer zombies and increase the attack power of surrounding plants

[ALOES_TOOLTIP]
It can purify the poison mist of perfumer zombies and increase the attack power of surrounding plants

[ALOES_PRODUCT_SHORT_DESC]
It can purify the poison mist of perfumer zombies and increase the attack power of surrounding plants

[ALOES_PRODUCT_SHORT_DESC]
It can purify the poison mist of perfumer zombies and increase the attack power of surrounding plants

[STORE_PRODUCT_AVATAR_ALOES]
Ice crystals are included in the water mist made, and zombies shrouded in ice crystals are frozen

[STORE_PRODUCT_AVATAR_ALOES_TITLE]
Aloe Costume

[ALOES_SKILL_LEVEL1]
Crystal Hydrating

[ALOES_SKILL_LEVEL1_DES]
There is a probability of throwing a droplet that increases attack power and attack speed

[ALOES_SKILL_LEVEL2]
Moisturizing smooth

[ALOES_SKILL_LEVEL2_DES]
Increase the effect of Skill 2 by 100%

[ALOES_SKILL_LEVEL5]
Ice water droplets

[ALOES_SKILL_LEVEL5_DES]
The aloe doctor throws out 1 drop of ice water, providing an additional 20% attack power, and during the duration of the water mist, the zombies in the water mist are subjected to ice deceleration

[ALOES_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL1_DES]
The aloe vera doctor throws out 1 water droplet every 10 seconds to create water mist for the surrounding 3x3 grid, so that plants in this range can regain 10% of their health per second and increase their attack power by 20% for 7 seconds. ^ff0000^It has a miraculous effect on the perfumer's poisonous mist! ^oldclr^

[ALOES_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL2_DES]
There is a 50% probability of throwing out more crystal clear and moist water droplets, providing plants with an additional 100% attack speed bonus.

[ALOES_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL3_DES]
The skill trigger probability of crystal hydration is increased by 100%, and more crystal hydrating water droplets are thrown out by 100.

[ALOES_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL4_DES]
There is a high probability of be boosted

[ALOES_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL5_DES]
Dr. Aloe's water mist is upgraded to ice mist, which provides an additional 20% attack power bonus and allows zombies entering the range to enter ice deceleration.

[ALOES_PLANTFOOD_DESCRIPTION]
The aloe vera doctor condensed a large amount of dew and threw 5 water droplets into the full screen, allowing the plant to obtain life recovery and attack power bonus for 7 seconds.

[ALOES_AVATAR_PLANTFOOD_DESCRIPTION]
The aloe vera doctor condensed a large amount of dew and threw 5 water droplets into the full screen, allowing the plant to obtain a higher life recovery and attack power bonus of ^ff0000^ for 8 seconds. And the water mist contains ice crystals, and the zombies shrouded in ice crystals will be frozen Ⅰ^oldclr^^0072ff^^oldclr^^ff0000^2 seconds. ^oldclr^

[GENE_DESCRIPTION_ALOES]
The attack power bonus effect of ordinary water droplets of Aloe Vera Doctor increases {Param_1}%

[NEW_AVATAR_SHORT_DESCRIPTION_ALOES_1]
Aloe War Flag Set

[NEW_AVATAR_DESCRIPTION_ALOES_1]
Reduce sun cost by 20

[NEW_AVATAR_SHORT_DESCRIPTION_ALOES_2]
Aloe Doctor Anniversary Costume

Everyone else had these elaborate costumes, and she thought that it would be funny to dress like a plain ol' ghost. But she fell in love with that costume. It spoke to her. She'd found her calling.

[MORNINGGLORY_SKILL_LEVEL2_DES]

[MORNINGGLORY_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL2_DES]

{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}knocks back zombies 3 times
{KEYWORD}Plant features: {STAT}orange plant
{FLAVOR}You might remember in the WWF (World Wrestling Foliage) Chard Guard had his shining days. When he got the "Boy-Among-Boys" golden belt, he was something to behold! His moves! His style! His attitude! The crowd loved him. He was quite the star for a while there. Sure, those days are behind him. But if you watch carefully, when Chard Guard is fighting zombies, you'll see him use the he made famous - the wrestling. The "Punch Into Soul" secret technique - it gets 'em every time.

[CHARDGUARD_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL3_DES]

[HOCUSCROCUS_SKILL_LEVEL5_DES]
Every time the magic crocus attacks twice, the next attack must emit a strengthened ray. The ray and the refracted ray must have a shrinking effect, reducing the size of the zombie by 50%, and reducing the order by 1. Has no effect on Gargantuars.

[HOCUSCROCUS_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL1_DES]
When a zombie appears on the right side of the magic crocus, it releases magic light to cause damage to the nearest zombie on the field. If the damage does not kill the zombie, reduce its size by 25%. ( is ineffective against giant zombies and zombies. The reduced zombie reduces the movement speed by 50% and increases the damage received by 20% for 5 seconds.

[HOCUSCROCUS_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL2_DES]
After the light hits the zombie, it will be refracted, causing damage to 2 zombies within three rows behind it, the damage is 25% of the initial light, and the refracted light has a 20% probability of shrinking effect.

[HOCUSCROCUS_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL3_DES]
After the light hits the zombie, it will be refracted, causing damage to 2 zombies within three rows behind it, the damage is 50% of the initial light, and the refracted light has a 50% probability of shrinking effect.

[HOCUSCROCUS_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL4_DES]
There is a high probability of be boosted

[ORCHIDMAGE_SKILL_LEVEL2_DES]
he trigger probability of Gravitational Entanglement is increased by 100%, and there is a 30% probability of gravitational restraint effect on small and medium-sized zombies.

[ORCHIDMAGE_SKILL_LEVEL5_DES]
When there are 3 small gravitational balls, they will be launched together when attacking, and a black hole will be generated for 3 seconds after the explosion. The black hole will cause 1 damage per second and pull the surrounding small and medium zombies for 0.5 blocks and large zombies for 0.3 blocks. The small and medium-sized zombies in the center will be dragged into the black hole and killed instantly. The small gravitational ball recovers 1 every 10 seconds.

[ORCHIDMAGE_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL1_DES]
When a zombie appears on the right side, a gravitational ball flying to the right is fired, and the gravitational ball explodes to cause damage to the surrounding 3x3 zombies as it passes through the first zombie 1 square, and pulls the zombie 0.5 square toward the center. When a zombie appears in the 1 square on the right, a small gravitational ball overhead is fired out to repel a single zombie in the 1 square.

[ORCHIDMAGE_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL2_DES]
When the gravitational ball deals damage to zombies, there is a 15% chance to cause gravitational binding effect on small and medium-sized zombies.

[ORCHIDMAGE_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL3_DES]
he trigger probability of Gravitational Entanglement is increased by 100%, and there is a 30% probability of gravitational restraint effect on small and medium-sized zombies.

[ORCHIDMAGE_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL4_DES]
There is a high probability of be boosted

[ORCHIDMAGE_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL5_DES]
When there are 3 small gravitational balls, they will be launched together when attacking, and a black hole will be generated for 3 seconds after the explosion. The black hole will cause 1 damage per second and pull the surrounding small and medium zombies for 0.5 blocks and large zombies for 0.3 blocks. The small and medium-sized zombies in the center will be dragged into the black hole and killed instantly. The small gravitational ball recovers 1 every 10 seconds.

[ORCHIDMAGE_PLANTFOOD_DESCRIPTION]

A damage of 2400 points will leave a crater on the impact point of the meteorite and the rolling ground.

Plants cannot be grown on the crater.

[PYREVINE_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL2_DES]
When a fire plant is planted inside Pyre Vine, the plant will gain a 30% increase in a attack damage. Pyre Vine's attack range is further increased by 1 tile.

[PYREVINE_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL5_DES]

When the energy is not full, Gluttonous Snapdragon will take out snacks and eat them to restore energy. If there is a zombie in front of it, it will cause bite damage and restore energy

[GLUTTONYDRAGON_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL5_DES]
After breathing fire, a clone of the main body with a duration the same as the fire breathing duration will appear above it. The clone will continuously spit homing fireballs. When a homing fireball hits a zombie, it will be burned and take continuous damage.

[GLUTTONYDRAGON_PLANTFOOD_DESCRIPTION]
Gluttonous Snapdragon will drag three nearest zombies to and then push any surviving zombies on the same lane away by releasing a burp, akin to Chomper's Plant Food ability with the difference is the burp pushes surviving zombies farther.

After the sun explodes, it will release red stars that deal fire damage. The attack cooldowns of the Golden Flower and Silver Flower are calculated separately.

[RHUBARBARIAN_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL1_DES]
Rhubarbarian has basic melee attack abilities, targeting a single zombie within 1 tile in front. Additionally, it possesses a jumping skill that activates when zombies are within 3 tiles ahead. It will jump 1 tile forward and begin attacking. If zombies are too close, it jumps in place, stunning all zombies in its own tile and the tile directly in front. If Rhubarbarian jumps forward, it will return to its original tile after the stun effect ends. The jumping skill has an internal cooldown of several seconds.

[RHUBARBARIAN_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL2_DES]
The maximum jumping range is increased by 1 tile, and the stun duration and attack duration are both increased by 1 second.

[RHUBARBARIAN_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL3_DES]

[RHUBARBARIAN_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL5_DES]
There is a chance of entering the violent mode after jumping. Attacks in the violent mode have a chance of instantly killing small and medium-sized zombies, or causing high damage and stun to mechanical zombies and Gargantuars. The violent mode ends after jumping back to the original place.

Aqua Vine may be boosted when planted.

[AQUAVINE_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL5_DES]
After every 5 attacks, the next attack will blow out a waterspout, causing damage and carrying a small to medium-sized zombie 2 tiles to the right, and then the waterspout continues to move to the right.

[AQUAVINE_PLANTFOOD_DESCRIPTION]
Aqua Vine will attract zombies to the lane and release a piercing knockback wave that will also extinguish zombie fires. If planted on land or over a land plant, Aqua Vine will only attract zombies in a 3x3 area. 
If planted on water or over an amphibious plant, Aqua Vine will attract zombies across the entirety of both adjacent lanes.

[AQUAVINE_AVATAR_PLANTFOOD_DESCRIPTION]
Stuns zombies for an additional 3 seconds upon impact.

[STORE_PRODUCT_AVATAR_AQUAVINE_TITLE]
Aqua Vine Outfit

[AQUAVINE_AVATAR_NAME]
Aqua Vine Outfit

[STORE_PRODUCT_AVATAR_AQUAVINE]
Launch a water tornado, which will stun zombies for 3 seconds.

[ADVICE_PLANT_NOT_WITH_AQUAVINE]
Cannot be planted on Aqua Vines.

[ADVICE_PLANT_AQUAVINE_ON_LILYPAD]
Cannot plant Aqua Vines on Lily Pads.




[WINTERRAMBUTAN]
Frost Rambutan

[WINTERRAMBUTAN_DESCRIPTION]
{KEYWORD}Plant features: {STAT}White plant
{FLAVOR}Frost Rambutan likes to play in the snow, so he moved to the north solely for this purpose

[WINTERRAMBUTAN_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
Spits out snowballs to attack, with a chance of freezing the attacked zombie and directly breaking the ice through impact.

[WINTERRAMBUTAN_TOOLTIP]
Spits out snowballs to attack, with a chance of freezing the attacked zombie and directly breaking the ice through impact.

[WINTERRAMBUTAN_PRODUCT_SHORT_DESC]
Spits out snowballs to attack, with a chance of freezing the attacked zombie and directly breaking the ice through impact.

[WINTERRAMBUTAN_SKILL_LEVEL1]
Powerful Frost

[WINTERRAMBUTAN_SKILL_LEVEL1_DES]
The probability of freezing zombies when attacking is increased to 10%, and the probability of attacking frozen or frozen zombies to enter the frozen state is increased to 20%.

[WINTERRAMBUTAN_SKILL_LEVEL2]
Super Ice

[WINTERRAMBUTAN_SKILL_LEVEL2_DES]
The probability of freezing zombies when attacking is increased to 15%, and the probability of attacking frozen or frozen zombies to enter the frozen state is increased to 30%.

[WINTERRAMBUTAN_SKILL_LEVEL5]
The Pogonip is Coming

[WINTERRAMBUTAN_SKILL_LEVEL5_DES]
After the snowball hits, all zombies within the 3x3 range of the icy fog have a 20% chance of getting frozen.

[WINTERRAMBUTAN_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL1_DES]
When zombies appear on the right side, spits out snowballs to attack zombies. Damage is dealt to the zombies hit and all zombies within a 3×3 range. Medium and small-sized zombies directly hit by the snowball have a chance to be frozen. After 7 attacks or if a frozen zombie appears on the right side, the Frost Rambutan will roll to the right. Zombies hit will be knocked back or the ice blocks formed by freezing will be shattered.

[WINTERRAMBUTAN_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL2_DES]
The probability of freezing zombies when attacking is increased to 10%, and the probability of attacking frozen or frozen zombies to enter the frozen state is increased to 20%.

[WINTERRAMBUTAN_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL3_DES]
The probability of freezing zombies when attacking is increased to 15%, and the probability of attacking frozen or frozen zombies to enter the frozen state is increased to 30%.

[WINTERRAMBUTAN_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL4_DES]
Frost Rambutan may be boosted when planted.

[WINTERRAMBUTAN_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL5_DES]
After the snowball hits, all zombies within the 3x3 range of the icy fog have a 20% chance of getting frozen.

[WINTERRAMBUTAN_PLANTFOOD_DESCRIPTION]
Frost Rambutan will inflate into a round spiky ball, after which he will roll down and change directions by 45 degrees every time a zombie is hit.

[WINTERRAMBUTAN_AVATAR_PLANTFOOD_DESCRIPTION]
Will leave a temporary icy tile will only chill and slow down zombies that step on it.

[STORE_PRODUCT_AVATAR_WINTERRAMBUTAN_TITLE]
Frost Rambutan Outfit

[WINTERRAMBUTAN_AVATAR_NAME]
Frost Rambutan Outfit

[STORE_PRODUCT_AVATAR_WINTERRAMBUTAN]
Creates ice blocks after plants food impact. Zombies stepping on the ice blocks will be slowed.





[WIREGELSEMIUM]
Electric Heartbreak

[WIREGELSEMIUM_DESCRIPTION]
{KEYWORD}Usage: {STAT}Click or hold Heartbreak and drag to the target
{KEYWORD}Range: {STAT}Full range of lawn
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}Causes electric damage in the affected area
{KEYWORD}Plant features:{STAT}Green plant
{FLAVOR}Half of Electric Heartbreak's blood is of the Phytophthora bloodline, which is perhaps the reason it gave up poisoning and switched to electrocuting.

[WIREGELSEMIUM_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
Electric Heartbreak can launch lightning rods onto any tile on the lawn

[WIREGELSEMIUM_TOOLTIP]
Click on Electric Heartbreak, then click on a tile to fire a lightning spike.

[WIREGELSEMIUM_PRODUCT_SHORT_DESC]
Electric Heartbreak can manually target specific enemies.

[WIREGELSEMIUM_SKILL_LEVEL1]
Quick Power-up

[WIREGELSEMIUM_SKILL_LEVEL1_DES]
The attack rate is reduced by 0.25, and the damage multiplication limit is increased by 1 times.

[WIREGELSEMIUM_SKILL_LEVEL2]
Superconducting Amplification

[WIREGELSEMIUM_SKILL_LEVEL2_DES]
The attack interval is reduced by 0.50, and the damage multiplication limit is increased by 2 times.

[WIREGELSEMIUM_SKILL_LEVEL5]
Electric Energy Conversion

[WIREGELSEMIUM_SKILL_LEVEL5_DES]
The end point of the wire can target other electric plants. When targeting other electric plants, the attack power of the targetted plant will be enhanced based on the current strength of the wire.

[WIREGELSEMIUM_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL1_DES]
Click on Electric Heartbreak to obtain a crosshair. Then, click on any tile on the lawn to fire a lightning spike, which continuously damages zombies within the electric wire and the 3×3 area at the landing point. If the lightning spike connects to another Electric Heartbreak its damage will be enhanced.

[WIREGELSEMIUM_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL2_DES]
The attack rate is reduced by 0.25, and the damage multiplication limit is increased by 1 times.

[WIREGELSEMIUM_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL3_DES]
The attack interval is reduced by 0.5, and the damage multiplication limit is increased by 2 times.

[WIREGELSEMIUM_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL4_DES]
Electric Heartbreak have a high chance to be boosted when planted.

[WIREGELSEMIUM_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL5_DES]
The end point of the wire can target other electric plants. When targeting other electric plants, the attack power of the targetted plant will be enhanced based on the current strength of the wire.

[WIREGELSEMIUM_PLANTFOOD_DESCRIPTION]
Fires an electric will launch electric wires all over the lawn, dealing 1 damage to all zombies.

[WIREGELSEMIUM_AVATAR_PLANTFOOD_DESCRIPTION]
Damage increased by 50%.

[WIREGELSEMIUM_AVATAR_NAME]
Electric Heartbreak Outfit

[ADVICE_TUTORIAL_TITLE]
Hints

[ADVICE_TUTORIAL_RULE]
Please follow the hints!

[ADVICE_ANIM_PLANT_SUNFLOWER]
Hint:
1. Drag the Sunflower card onto the lawn to plant a Sunflower.
2. Sunflowers produce sun.

[ADVICE_IMG_ZOMBIE_HINT]
Hint:
1. Zombies will eat your plants.
2. Never let zombies reach the leftmost house!

[ADVICE_ANIM_PLANT_PEASHOOTER]
Hint:
1. Drag the Peashooter card onto the lawn to plant a Peashooter.
2. Peashooters attack incoming zombies.

[ADVICE_IMG_BUCKET_ZOMBIE]
Hint:
1. Buckethead Zombies have super sturdy buckets to withstand your attacks. Use ^00FF00 plant food^oldclr^ when you have few plants!

[ADVICE_ANIM_PLANTFOOD]
Hint:
1. Drag plant food onto plants to unleash powerful plant food abilities!
2. The Peashooter's plant food ability can deal with very strong zombies.

[ADVICE_IMG_PF_ZOMBIE]
Hint:
1. Defeating zombies emitting green light will grant plant food, a big help for you to pass the level!

[ADVICE_ABOUT_PLANT_ARMORFLAME]
Please plant the Armor Flame Assembler on an empty space with 2 grids.

[ADVICE_ABOUT_PLANT_ARMORFLAME_ON_VINE]
The Armor Flame Assembler cannot be planted on vines.

[CHOMPER]
Chomper

[CHOMPER_DESCRIPTION]
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}Vulnerable to zombie attacks while digesting zombies
{KEYWORD}Plant features: {STAT}Purple plant, Sharp-toothed
{FLAVOR}Everyone appreciates what Chomper does. His appetite has saved them on numerous occasions. But truth be told, Chomper's friends think that eating zombies is gross. And his breath! No one has the heart to tell him, and he never gets the hint when you offer him a mint.

[CHOMPER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
Chomper can devour zombies in front but is vulnerable to zombie attacks while digesting zombies.

[CHOMPER_PLANTFOOD]
When using its Plant Food effect, it can swallow three zombies at once and then spit out a gas that can push back zombies.

[CHOMPER_TOOLTIP]
Chew on zombies for a while after eating them.

[SWEETPOTATO_PLANTFOOD]
When unleashed, it can make itself invulnerable for a period of time.

[SWEETPOTATO_TOOLTIP]
Attracts nearby zombies and blocks their path.

[STORE_CATEGORY_NAME_AVATAR_TICKET]
Avatar Tickets

[AVATAR_TICKET_DESCRIPTION]
Event Rules:
1. Players can buy initial plant outfits using Outfit Tickets in the Plant Outfits section.
2. Outfit Tickets can be obtained from the Outfit Ticket Shop and events.
3. First-time purchases in the shop will grant bonus tickets:
   - 6 CNY Pack: 60 tickets + 18 bonus
   - 30 CNY Pack: 330 tickets + 132 bonus
   - 68 CNY Pack: 780 tickets + 360 bonus
   - 128 CNY Pack: 1550 tickets + 700 bonus
   - 328 CNY Pack: 4100 tickets + 2050 bonus
   - 648 CNY Pack: 8450 tickets + 4650 bonus
4. Outfit Tickets can only be used for initial outfits, not for special or rare outfits.
5. Rare and new plant outfits may be available for limited-time purchase.
6. Required Outfit Tickets for outfits:
   - White Plant: 60
   - Green Plant: 120
   - Blue Plant: 180
   - Purple Plant: 250
   - Special Purple: 500
   - Orange Plant: 400
   - Special Orange: 800

[AVATAR_TICKET_TITLE]
Avatar Ticket Instructions

[STORE_CATEGORY_NAME_COINS]
Coins

[LUCKYCHEST_DES_DESCRIPTION]

666. sorry i need to remove a lot of text again

1. During the event period from August 26, 2024, to September 22, 2024, players can accumulate daily progress by completing main storyline levels (Normal and Hard), Secret Realm, Endless Mode, Penny's Pursuit, Memory, Co-op.
2. Upon completing 1, 5, and 10 levels each day, players can claim a Lucky Chest. The completion progress resets daily and cannot carry over to the next day.
3.  Each Lucky Chest can be upgraded three times. After all three upgrade attempts are used, the chest will be opened to receive the current reward.
4.. The probability of receiving each Chest is: 
Common Chest         43%, 
Intermediate Chest      29%, 
Advanced Chest         17%, 
Epic Chest               7%, 
Legendary Chest         4%.


[LUCKYCHEST_DES_TITLE]
Lucky Treasure Event Description

[STAR_CONVERT_TITLE]
Stars shop 

[STAR_CONVERT_INFO_TITLE]
Star Redemption Instructions

[STAR_CONVERT_INFO]
1. The number of stars obtained after clearing the various worlds is accumulated to sum up. The corresponding reward may be claimed when the prescribed quantity has been reached.
2. After the already owned plants are upgraded, the star redemption cannot be obtained repeatedly, and you will not get plant pieces if you collect them again.

Dave arrives at the legendary Lost City for the magic taco! None of the various treasure hunters were spared to become zombies in this cursed earth.
 
Lost City Ruins Adventure
Sun Umbrella Zombie Immune Ejection, the guide zombie will open the dark path.
Pilot zombies fall from the sky and archaeological zombies attack from a distance.
The devil is one foot high and the Tao is one foot high. The Plant Legion also has new friends!
The golden toad mushroom can swallow zombies to produce sun, and the daisy is good at group slowdown.
Jackfruit can seal the secret passage, and the Red Needle has three forms.
 <image=IMAGE_UI_DIALOG_ASSET_NOTICE_BANNER_0 align=center width=1016 height=320>
 
The garden war is about to break out
New PvP function is turned on. Come and play PvP now and get 10 diamonds for each win, up to 50 diamonds a day!
There are also exciting PvP daily achievement activities for you to challenge, and rare plant pieces are waiting for you!
 <image=IMAGE_UI_DIALOG_ASSET_NOTICE_BANNER_4 align=center width=1016 height=320>
 
Six great gifts to welcome the New Year
From February 1st to February 15th, click on firecrackers to draw Spring Festival-limited plants, and play the ingot battle to win red envelopes
From February 7th to February 22nd, you can guess lantern riddles for free and win red envelopes
From February 1st to February 11th, you can win prizes by smashing golden eggs by recharging
There will be big rebates when you recharge from February 12th to February 22nd
From February 1st to February 22nd, you can get a free gift package when you recharge
 <image=IMAGE_UI_DIALOG_ASSET_NOTICE_BANNER_1 align=center width=1016 height=320>

  sign-in plant surprises 
In February, the new plant kiwi fruit will be launched. If you insist on signing in, you can get second-level plants and generous diamond rewards!
 
  小pea

[NOTICE_CONTENT_FIRST_DEVIL_COMING]
Dear plant buddies,
        The world of KongFu is ushering in an unprecedented major update!
        The Sceond part of the much-anticipated world of KongFu has been opened! Prepare your most powerful plant line-up, as the incredibly powerful Knife Master and his brother Gunpowder Demon will be stationed in the later stages of the KongFu waiting for your challenge!
        At the same time, Dr. Zombie also takes advantage of the chaos to appear! In the newly opened daily challenge, you'll encounter Doctor Zombie, and the difficulty will go harder and harder every time! Defeat him to get the latest top 5 plant costumes, and these new costumes will also give plants new abilities like never before!
        New BOSS, new levels, new plant costumes, massive new content, what are you waiting for? Come and experience the game!
 

[NOTICE_CONTENT_FIRST_QQ]
Dear plant buddies, 
 Crazy Dave has traveled to China, and a big wave of KongFu zombies sharpening their knives is coming to your head! 
 At the same time, we have prepared a more exciting daily challenge for all of you, and do you feel that zombies are not powerful enough? Ancient
 giant zombies have been summoned! Not enough to beat just one snowman zombie each time? We have a snowman rampaging, and a large number of snowman zombies in the Year of the Horse are coming at you!
 A new plant dressing system is already online! Putting new clothing on the plants, in addition to being more gorgeous, can also unlock new plant skills! And beat the giants every day to get these precious prizes!
 New KongFu Plants, new gameplay makes a shining debut! Plant plants with Dave and experience a new game of joy!

[NETWORK_NOT_CONNECTED_TEXT_FOR_SYNC_PLAYERINFO]

[NETWORK_NOT_CONNECTED_DANGERROOM_UPLOAD_FAILED]
The network connection failed so much that it was impossible to upload your endless mode score.
Please fix the network and re-enter Endless Mode, where scores are re-uploaded at the leaderboard.

[RECHARGE_NOTICE_TITLE]
Accumulated recharge with great gifts!

[RECHARGE_NOTICE_DESC_FOR_LOTTERY]
Accumulate a total of 2 yuan in the game, get double the gold coin income in the game, and buy gold coin plants faster!
With a total of 6 yuan, you can participate in 2 lucky draws every day! Lucky gifts for you to choose from!
If you recharge more than 10 yuan in total, you will get a value-for-money random plant gift pack!
Fill up 20 yuan in total, permanently turn on 2 times the speed in the game, and fight zombies more powerfully!
If you charge 30 yuan in total, you will immediately receive the in-game artifact - Cherry Bomb! Wide range of high damage!
Killing zombies instantly from now on is not a dream!

[RECHARGE_NOTICE_DESC]

[BAMBOO]
Bamboo Shoot

[BAMBOO_DESCRIPTION]
{KEYWORD}Plant features: {STAT} green plant,Short plant
{FLAVOR} Bamboo Shoots learned the earth escape KongFu from Tu Xingsun, and after unremitting efforts, he finally won the title of bachelor's degree from the Drill Bit Engineering College.

[BAMBOO_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
Move underground and cause puncture damage to the zombies above.

[BAMBOO_PLANTFOOD]
Storage on top of the drill bit and launch a powerful puncture attack to knock the enemy away

[BAMBOO_TOOLTIP]
Moving back and forth on the ground, causing two injuries to passing zombies.

[PEACH]
Peach

[PEACH_DESCRIPTION]
{KEYWORD}Health recovery: {STAT} medium
{KEYWORD}Plant features: {STAT} red plant,Short plant
{FLAVOR} Xiantao's resume reads that she was originally the Queen Mother's royal peach. After being demoted to earth, she became a battlefield doctor.

[PEACH_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
Can heal the surrounding plants and restore their health.

[PEACH_PLANTFOOD]
Produces an invincible shield that protects the surrounding plants from harm

[PEACH_TOOLTIP]
Can restore the health of surrounding plants.

[FIREGOURD]
Fire Gourd

[FIREGOURD_DESCRIPTION]
{KEYWORD}Usage: {STAT} Click Spitfire
{KEYWORD}Range: {STAT} straight line
{KEYWORD}Feature: {STAT} The longer the charge time, the stronger the flame ejected, and the weapon rack is specially defeated
{KEYWORD}Plant features: {STAT} yellow plant, full of anger
{FLAVOR} Fire Gourd was originally just a small supporting role in the acrobatic class. It was only after he entered the zombie battlefield that he discovered his true value.

[FIREGOURD_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
The fire gourd can spit fire forward after accumulating force, causing continuous flame damage and is particularly effective against wooden weapon racks.

[FIREGOURD_PLANTFOOD]
Spit flames in a whole line ahead

[FIREGOURD_TOOLTIP]
Fire can be spit and rested after clicking, the longer the rest period, the stronger the spit flame

[SETTINGS_DATASHARING_PROMPT_DISABLED]
The data sharing feature of the game has been disabled. Apart from the data you directly provide to Tuo Wei, specific information will be collected by Tuo Wei to improve the products and services provided to you. This includes software upgrades, dynamically adjusted content, product support, and communication with you to enhance your experience using Tuo Wei products and services. This data will not be shared with any third parties and will not be used to identify you. When you disable data sharing, Tuo Wei will still continue to collect some reasonable information, except for anonymous information, to ensure the operation of products and services. Would you like to enable data sharing?

[PVP_FOR_WANDOUJIA_COMPENSATION_CONTENT]
Dear players:
Thank you for updating. You can now upgrade the available population of zombies and the available sun for defense in the laboratory. To ensure the fairness of the game, we have reset everyone's defense lineup, reclaimed all zombies, and converted them into diamonds for you. Please be sure to accept them! Enjoy your game!

[SPEAKER_LENOVO_FIVE]
^FF0000[Chinese New Year Red Packets] ^oldclr The Chinese New Year event starts on February 13th. By challenging the God of Wealth and guessing lantern riddles, you can win a large number of red packets. Opening the red packets gives you a chance to win the super powerful Chinese New Year limited edition plant - Rafflesia!

[GACHA_GOT_PLANT_HINT]
You have already obtained this plant. The reward is automatically changed to {PIECE_COUNT} plant pieces.

[GACHA_GOT_AVATAR_HINT]
You have already obtained this costume. The reward is automatically changed to {PIECE_COUNT} costume pieces.

[RATING_RATE_NOW]
Give a rating to make the game better.

[RATING_RATE_LATER]
I'm busy now, remind me later.

[RATING_RATE_NEVER]
Brutally refuse, never remind me again.

Spend ^00e46e {GEM_COUNT} diamonds ^oldclr to purchase 20 scattered arrows. Are you sure you want to purchase?

The explosion will damage both plants and zombies.

{KEYWORD}Plant features: {STAT}Orange plant, Weapon family
{FLAVOR}Carrot was a fervent fan of robot animation in his youth. His room was filled with various robot models, and he played almost every electronic game with a robot theme. He even tried to tattoo himself with tattoos representing certain robots. After becoming a scientist, he began to study frantically how to use solar energy as the power source for robots... Later, he applied his research results to himself. So someone called him Carrot Missile Launcher, but he prefers to call himself Kobvon.

{KEYWORD}Plant features: {STAT}White plant
{FLAVOR}Dandelion was once an ordinary literary youth. In his spare time, he liked to lie under a big tree to read books and look up at the sky. His dream was to become a pilot soaring in the blue sky. So when he grew up, he became an airport liaison officer... Yes, you didn't read it wrong, because incorrect reading posture for years caused his vision to deteriorate severely, and he failed the pilot physical examination!

{KEYWORD}Plant features: {STAT}Orange plant, Weapon family, Bucktoothed kid
{FLAVOR}Pomegranate accidentally read a book called Thousand Ways to Eat Pomegranate when he was sneaking a peek at the school flower in the library. The first sentence on the title page of the book impacted his life: No matter how you eat it, pomegranate seeds must be spit out. Later, he joined the army and became a machine gunner with terrible marksmanship. Later, he retired from the army and became a landlord who eats sunflower seeds and basks in the sun every day. What about later? Didn't you see the guy opposite who's spitting saliva wildly at you?

[LASERBEAN_SKILL1_LEVEL1]
Rapid Charging

[LASERBEAN_SKILL1_LEVEL1_DES]
Allows the Laser Bean to shoot two lasers with each attack, increasing total damage by 35%.

[LASERBEAN_SKILL1_LEVEL2]
Power Boost

[LASERBEAN_SKILL1_LEVEL2_DES]
Enhances Rapid Charging to make the Laser Bean continuously fire lasers, increasing total damage by another 35%.

[LASERBEAN_SKILL1_LEVEL5]
Energy Overload

[LASERBEAN_SKILL1_LEVEL5_DES]
Laser Bean will enter an enhanced state every 15 seconds or when being plant fooded, which during the enhanced state, Laser Bean's basic attack damage is increased by 100%, and Laser Bean's plant food effect will leave an electric mark and continue to cause a total of 1500 damage within three seconds.

[HOLONUT_SKILL1_LEVEL5]

[HOLONUT_SKILL1_LEVEL5_DES]

Just last night, he made a sumptuous brain stew using this bucket. Also, next time you go to see his band perform, remember to see what he uses as a foot drum.

[ZOMBIE_DARK_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
This forged bucket effectively protects him from harm.

The helmet bestowed upon him by the king provides astonishing damage resistance.

[DAILY_REWARD_COMPENSATION_CONTENT]
Dear players:

Due to some reasons we all know, the February sign-in version of Plants vs. Zombies 2 was not updated on time. To express our apologies to all players, Little Pea especially recovered the lost rewards for dear players in this update:
1. 100 diamonds
2. Sweet Potato Chips x10

Thank you for your support for Plants vs. Zombies 2, and I wish you a happy holiday in Plants vs. Zombies 2!

    Little Pea

[DAILY_REWARD_COMPENSATION_CONTENT_SPECIAL]
Dear players:

Due to some reasons we all know, the February sign-in version of Plants vs. Zombies 2 was not updated on time. To express our apologies to all players, Little Pea especially recovered the lost rewards for dear players in this update:
1. 100 diamonds
2. Sweet Potato Chips x10

After the launch of the Giant Wave Beach version, due to data corruption resulting in the disappearance or overabundance of Sweet Potato, Lily Pad, Chomper, Bowling Bulb, 4 plants, we have restored them according to the pieces and levels before the error, and given players a compensation of 50 diamonds.

Thank you for your support for Plants vs. Zombies 2, and I wish you a happy holiday in Plants vs. Zombies 2!

    Little Pea

[REWARD_RULE_TITLE]
Reward rules

[REWARD_RULE_TEXT]
Rules of play:
1. There are 2 free challenges per day, and the number of challenges will be reset at 12 am that day.
2. The event settles the ranking reward every 7 days, and you can only claim the ranking reward from the previous issue after the end of each event.
 3. The number of awards is related to your all-time high in the previous issue.
Reward rules:
 1st place 800 diamonds
 2nd 500 Diamonds
 3rd 400 Diamonds
 4th-10th 300 Diamonds
 11th-100th 200 Diamonds
 101st-1000th 150 Diamonds
Lv.9 myth maker(3500000 points) 108 diamonds
Lv.8 zombie terminator(3000000 points) 88 diamonds
Lv.7 zombie butcher(2500000 points) 68 diamonds
Lv.6 zombie nemesis(2000000 points) 58 diamonds
Lv.5 zombie killer(1500000 points) 48 diamonds
Lv.4 Master Zombie Hunter (1000000 points) 38 diamonds
Lv.3 skilled hunter(500000 points) 28 diamonds
Lv.2 rookie hunter(100000 points) 18 diamonds
Lv.1 Novice on the road (0 points) 8 diamonds

Do not disclose any financial information in the communication.

Enhancement Instructions

[SUPER_ACCESSORY_STEADY_DES_DESCRIPTION]
1. The pendant reinforcement object can only be a new super pendant
2. Super pendants require further reinforcement with specific materials
3. The reinforcement consumption is as follows:
          Initial strengthening to level 1:20 dusts    1000 gold coins
          Level 1 strengthened to Level 2: 30 dusts    1,500 gold coins
          Level 2 is strengthened to level 3: 50 dusts, 2,000 gold coins, and 5 space-time crystals
          Level 3 is strengthened to level 4: 70 dusts    2,000 gold coins, and 15 space-time crystals
          Level 4 is strengthened to level 5: 100 dusts    2,000 gold coins, and 30 space-time crystals

Opening the red packet can get you the limited-time plant ^FF0000 Bamboo Brother^oldclr, as well as beach new plants and ^FF0000 brand new plant accessories!^oldclr

Opening red packets before the sixth day of the lunar new year (2.24) also allows you to participate in the leaderboard competition and receive rewards:

1st Place: Resin Pitcher Pieces *90, Tier 4 Accessory Super Energy Powder Barrel, Tier 4 Accessory Rubber Duck Swimming Ring

2nd Place: Resin Pitcher Pieces *80, Tier 4 Accessory Super Energy Powder Barrel, Tier 4 Accessory Rubber Duck Swimming Ring

3rd Place: Resin Pitcher Pieces *70, Tier 4 Accessory Super Energy Powder Barrel, Tier 4 Accessory Rubber Duck Swimming Ring

4th to 10th Place: Resin Pitcher Pieces *60, Tier 4 Accessory Super Energy Powder Barrel, Tier 4 Accessory Rubber Duck Swimming Ring

11th to 50th Place: Resin Pitcher Pieces *50, Tier 3 Accessory High-Energy Powder Barrel

51st to 100th Place: Resin Pitcher Pieces *40, Tier 3 Accessory High-Energy Powder Barrel

101st to 200th Place: Resin Pitcher Pieces *30, Tier 3 Accessory High-Energy Powder Barrel

201st to 500th Place: Resin Pitcher Pieces *20, Tier 3 Accessory High-Energy Powder Barrel

501st to 1000th Place: Resin Pitcher Pieces *10, Tier 3 Accessory High-Energy Powder Barrel

[ICEAGE]
Frostbite Caves

[ICEAGE_LAST]
Frostbite Caves - Ultimate Challenge

[ICEAGE_LAST1]
Time Travel - Frostbite Caves

[ICEAGE_LEVEL_NAME]
Frostbite Caves - Day {LEVEL_NUMBER}

[XSHOT]
Rotobaga

[XSHOT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
Rotobaga can launch bullets along 4 diagonal directions, aiming at one target in each direction.

[XSHOT_DESCRIPTION]
{KEYWORD}Range: {STAT} Shoots in four directions
{KEYWORD}Plant features: {STAT} Purple plant, Flying plant
{FLAVOR} Sometimes Rotobaga overhears other plants gossiping. Did you notice? So-and-so has gained weight. They'll say things like that, or I heard so-and-so is dating so-and-so, can you believe it? But Rotobaga isn't into that kind of gossip. She's more interested in surpassing others than gossiping behind their backs.

[XSHOT_TOOLTIP]
Shoots bullets along 4 diagonal directions.

[XSHOT_PLANTFOOD]
Quickly shoots a stream of bullets in 4 diagonal directions.

[SUGARCANE]
Bamboo Brother

{KEYWORD}Plant features: {STAT} Green plant, Highly skilled
{FLAVOR} Sugarcane started running errands for a theater troupe in the neighboring town since he was young. From playing small roles since childhood, he hoped to one day become the mainstay of the troupe. So he diligently practiced various martial arts, finally mastering the continuous backflip. One day, Sugarcane received his first starring role, the main plot of which goes like this: One day, in the forest, a fierce wolf kidnapped a little pig, and the pig's brave mother bravely sought the wolf's den to rescue it...

[AGE_TIP]
Age Advisory for Plants vs. Zombies 2 Game

[AGE_TIP_CONTENT]
1) This game is a strategy tower defense game suitable for users aged 12 and above. It is recommended that minors use the game products under parental supervision.

2) The characters and plot of this game are fictional and will not be confused with real life. Integrated with elements of real-time strategy, tower defense, and card collection, players need to control cards to defend against attacks and achieve mission goals. The game does not contain voice or chat functions.

3) According to national requirements, the game has a real-name authentication system. Users who have not passed the real-name authentication cannot enter the game; users certified as minors cannot enter the game at any time other than 20:00 to 21:00 daily on Fridays, Saturdays, Sundays, and legal holidays. Some gameplay and items in the game require payment. Users certified as minors will be subject to the following management:
 - Users under 8 years old cannot make payments.
 - Users aged 8 or above but under 16 cannot recharge more than 50 yuan in a single transaction or exceed a cumulative monthly recharge amount of 200 yuan.
 - Users aged 16 or above cannot recharge more than 100 yuan in a single transaction or exceed a cumulative monthly recharge amount of 400 yuan.

4) The game requires players to allocate resources reasonably, upgrade plant levels, arrange battlefield formations to enhance team strength for victory in battles, and adjust combat strategies based on battlefield events, helping to improve players' logical thinking and adaptability.

[DANGERROOM_RULE_BTN_TXT]
Rules Explanation

[DANGERROOM_REWARD_BTN_TXT]
Score Rewards

[DANGERROOM_RULE_TXT]

666. sorry i need to remove a lot of text or the game will not show anything!

1. Endless Challenge mode opens on Thu-Sun, with holiday adjustments.
2. Each session features a different world, with previews on non-open days and recommended plants listed.
3. Endless Training is available for practice, but no points or medals are earned.
4. On open days, players can spend diamonds to reset. Sat-Sun offer one free reset.
5. Points are earned after clearing levels; current points reset after a challenge, but highest points stay for leaderboard.
6. Medals are awarded after clearing levels and can be used in the shop.
7. Sun, tactical cucumbers, lawnmowers, artifact uses, and remaining plants carry over but reset after a full reset.
8. Tactical cucumber count is separate from other modes.
9. Plant usage has a limit, but restores slightly after each level.
10. Boss levels appear every 5th level with a free card draw.
11. After the second challenge, levels can be skipped.
12. Special zombies may appear.

[DANGERROOM_RULE_TXT2]
Made by evil :)

[MINIGAME_RULE_TXT2]
Fun Race Challenge Instructions

[MINIGAME_RULE_TXT]
1. The fun competition will be open from November 9, 2024, to November 22, 2024, with a new mini-game available each day.

2. During the event, players have no limit on the number of daily challenges. Players will earn points and enhancement energy upon successfully completing mini-game levels.

3. Points earned from completing levels include base points and time-based points. For normal levels, base points are 1000, with a time-based point cap of 500. For hard levels, base points are 2000, with a time-based point cap of 500.

4. Time-based points are awarded based on the time taken to complete the level.

5. After completing a mini-game, players can redeem rewards based on the points earned.

6. Points earned in mini-games can be converted into enhancement energy at a certain ratio.

7. Enhancement energy can be used to strengthen mini-games, granting corresponding enhancement effects.

Zombie Blood Pack

[PVPSKILL_AID_UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION]

[ZOMBIE_PVPSKILL_INVISIBLE]
Mist of War

[ZOMBIE_PVPSKILL_INVISIBLE_DESCRIPTION]
Dr. Zombie's latest technology, the fog of war can produce a small range of smoke bombs on the battlefield. Passing zombies will be protected by the fog and will not be discovered by plants.

[PVPSKILL_INVISIBLE_UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION]
Next order: duration of each smoke bomb, increase {COUNT} seconds

[ZOMBIE_PVPSKILL_ZOMBIEFOOD]
Plague potions

[ZOMBIE_PVPSKILL_ZOMBIEFOOD_DESCRIPTION]
What happens if a zombie gets a plague? Become a zombie superman, of course! In order to allow zombies to develop super skills, Dr. Zombie developed the miracle medicine Plague Potion. After use, zombies each use their own unique skills.

[PVPSKILL_ZOMBIEFOOD_UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION]
Next order: plague virus evolution, reduce {COUNT}% energy consumption each time

[ZOMBIE_PVPSKILL_RAGE]
Fury potion

[ZOMBIE_PVPSKILL_RAGE_DESCRIPTION]
The most terrifying thing isn't zombies, it's enraged zombies. The Doctor Zomboss invented rage potion, and the zombies are all excited. Their attack power and speed are greatly enhanced. Of course, due to excessive excitement, they're also more susceptible to damage!

[PVPSKILL_RAGE_UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION]
Next Tier: Each time Rage is used, zombies' attack power and speed increase by {COUNT}%.

[SETTINGS_DATASHARING_PROMPT_DISABLED]
The data sharing feature of the game has been disabled. Apart from the data you directly provide to Tuo Wei, specific information will be collected by Tuo Wei to improve the products and services provided to you. This includes software upgrades, dynamically adjusted content, product support, and communication with you to enhance your experience using Tuo Wei products and services. This data will not be shared with any third parties and will not be used to identify you. When you disable data sharing, Tuo Wei will still continue to collect some reasonable information, except for anonymous information, to ensure the operation of products and services. Would you like to enable data sharing?

{KEYWORD}Characteristics: {STAT} Shrinks imp zombies to the point of invisibility.
{KEYWORD}Plant features: {STAT} Purple plant, short

[WORLDCUP_TUTORIAL_ADVICE_1]
You can only plant plants where marked to set up your formation!

[WORLDCUP_TUTORIAL_ADVICE_2]
Zombies with a ball mark on their heads appear!

[WORLDCUP_TUTORIAL_ADVICE_3]
Kill it, and your plants will gain ball possession and have a chance to shoot!

[WORLDCUP_TUTORIAL_ADVICE_4]
Drag the ball energy bean onto a plant to shoot!

[WORLDCUP_TUTORIAL_ADVICE_5]
Within the time limit, you must defeat the zombies to win. In case of a draw, you need to challenge again!

[WORLDCUP_TUTORIAL_ADVICE_6]
Come on, dear players, show your skills at the sports event! Completing the tutorial level can earn you ice hockey medals!!!

[PVZ_WORLDCUP_TITLE]
Ice Hockey Match

[PVZ_WORLDCUP_DES]
Gameplay Overview:
· A large number of zombies will appear in the game, among which zombies with a ball possession mark on their heads will score a goal when they reach our baseline.
· Players play as the plant side, set up formations, and after setting up the formation, plants that kill zombies with ball possession marks will gain ball possession plants food. Dragging the ice hockey plants food onto plants with ball possession marks will shoot the soccer ball.
· Dragging plants food onto plants without ball possession marks will pass the ball to the plant before shooting.
· The ice hockey continues to advance without zombie obstruction or killing zombies. If it advances to the baseline, the player scores one point.
· After the time is up, the side with more goals wins. In case of a draw, players can challenge again.
· Completing levels will earn rich rewards!

Blasting Specialists

[MULBERRY_SKILL_LEVEL1_DES]

[MULBERRY_SKILL_LEVEL2_DES]

Fun Blasting

[MULBERRY_SKILL_LEVEL5_DES]
There is a probability of releasing random grenade bombs, blasting bombs cause high damage to the enemy and have a probability of blowing up zombies. Flash bombs can cause a immersive effect on enemy units within the 3X3 range, and poison gas bombs can cause a 10-second poisoning effect on enemy units within the 3X3 range.

[NARRATIVE_STEAM_13_INTRO_7]
{SAY:WINNIE} consumes diamonds to get a no-error double hammer, and you can get double points by hitting zombies and plants.

[ACTIVITY_GROUP_BUY_TITLE]
Group buying instructions

[ACTIVITY_GROUP_BUY_DESCRIPTION]
1. The group buy event starts at 9 AM on the day it begins and settles at 9 AM the next day. On the last day, the group buy settles at midnight.
2. During the event, players purchase items at full price using diamonds to join the group buy. After the group buy countdown ends, diamonds will be refunded based on the discount!
3. During the group buy period (when there is a group buy event entry), players will receive 10 Dave Coupons for every 1 yuan recharged. These coupons can be used to exchange for certain group buy plants. The group buy coupons are valid for the current event period and will be cleared after expiration.
4. Plants purchased in the group buy will be 3-star or 2-star plants. If the player already owns the same plant, it will be converted into plant pieces of the same level. Outfits will be converted into outfit pieces.

Reselect

[LUCKBAG_SELECT_TITLE]
Golden Autumn Lucky Bag Bundle Configuration

[LUCKBAG_CONFIRM]
Fukuro Confirmation

[LUCKBAG_CONFIRM_CONTENT]
The lucky bag plants you selected are:

[LUCKBAG_BUY]
45 yuan to activate

[LUCKBAG_DESCRIPTION]
Lucky bag instructions

[LUCKBAG_SELECT_ALL]
Choose every line!

[LUCKBAG_DESCRIPTION_CONTENT]
Activity content:
1. A total of 4 orange plants can be selected, and 2 purple plants can be put into the lucky bag. After opening the lucky bag, you must get one of the orange plants *1 + purple plants *1.
2. Lucky bags can be purchased repeatedly and plants can be re-selected.
3. If the player already has the plants in the lucky bag, the reward is converted into 10 plant pieces.
 
Lucky bag probability announcement
Orange plants: 
Plants in row 1 34.9% Plants in row 2 30.3% 
Third row plants 21.8% Fourth row plants 13.0%
Purple plants:
Plants in the fifth row 36.4% Plants in the sixth row 63.6%

League Shop

[JOUST_HOW_TO_PLAY]
Gameplay instructions

[JOUST_HOW_TO_PLAY_TITLE]
Gameplay instructions

[JOUST_HOWTOPLAY_1_DESCRIPTION]
Defeating zombies within a level earns points, with the side with the highest score within a set time winning.

[JOUST_HOWTOPLAY_2_DESCRIPTION]
The quicker it is to beat a zombie, the better it will be for you, and the further away the zombie is from your home, the higher the score it will get to beat him.

[JOUST_HOWTOPLAY_3_DESCRIPTION]
Battlez matches reward Crowns. Win Streaks reward bonus Crowns. Earn as many Crowns as you can to climb to the top of your leaderboard!

[JOUST_HOWTOPLAY_4_DESCRIPTION]
Entering the top 3 of your leaderboard, you will be promoted to a more competitive league, get better returns and challenge stronger opponents.

[JOUST_HOWTOPLAY_5_DESCRIPTION]
Each edition of the Super Z-League starts at 15:00 pm on Friday, with all fixtures for 5 weeks and the 6th week as the settlement week. Ends at 09:00 am on Friday of Week 6. After the current event, the next event will all undergo a level reset.

[JOUST_HOWTOPLAY_6_DESCRIPTION]
The player has a free key every day, and the countdown is turned on for 8 hours only after the number of free keys have been used, instead of giving you a free key every 8 hours. The free countdown stops if the player has spent diamonds or yuan on keys during this period. The free key countdown is only entered when the player's key count is 0.

[MAT_DRAGON_TREASURE_INTEGRAL]
Treasure House Points

[DRAGON_TREASURE_DESCRIPTION]
Activity rules:
1. Before getting the rewards from the Dragon Treasure House, please select 3 self-Custom Reward, and a fixed cost of 20 dragon crystals will be spent on each draw, with a probability of getting the final reward.
2. After obtaining all the rewards in the Dragon Treasure House, the current prize pool will be automatically reset; after players obtain 5 rewards from the treasure house of the current round, they can spend 10 Dragon Crystals to manually reset the lottery.
3. The progress, dragon crystal and points of this event are not inherited to the next period, after the event the remaining dragon crystal will be converted into diamonds in a ratio of 1:1, and the remaining points will be converted into gold coins in a ratio of 1:100.
4. Players can obtain rewards from the Dragon Clan Treasure House by spending Dragon Crystals, with a specific probability of:
Custom Reward 1 (Eggplant Ninja "Zero" Outfit, Hydraulic Artifact, Burdock Slugger Fragment *20)  1.00%
Custom Reward 2 (Targeted Fragments *10, Artifact Blessing Voucher *30, Burdock Slugger Fragment *10)  2.21%
Custom Reward 3 (Bearberry Mortar Fragment *10, Artifact Blessing Voucher *25, Eggplant Ninja Fragment *10)  1.89%
Genetic Primacy*4 11.50% Universal Genetic Coin*60 11.50%
Space-time energy tank*10 5.00% Space-time cubic*2 3.70%
Spacetime dust*10 13.00% Spacetime dust*20 5.00%
Spacetime Crystal*5 3.20% Spacetime Crystal*1 16.00%
Crystal Mystery*6000 8.00% Crystal Mystery*18000 2.50%
Diamond*200 2.50% Diamond*50 13.00%

[DRAGON_TREASURE_DESCRIPTION_TITLE]
Dragon Treasure House Activity Description

[ACTIVITY_DRAGONT_REASURE_SHORT_DESCRIPTION]
During the event, players can receive gift pack props and dragon crystals when purchasing gift packs, and receive extra number points, which can be redeemed at the store for props, and dragon crystals are used in treasure house draws

Here is the translation of the provided text:

[TREASURE_PAVILION]
Exquisite Treasure Chest

[TREASURE_PAVILION_BUNDLE]
Gold Bar Shop

[TREASURE_PAVILION_EXPIRED]
Exquisite Treasure Chest Gold Bar Expiry Settlement

[TREASURE_PAVILION_MAT_NOT_ENOUGH]
Insufficient gold bars. Would you like to go to the Gold Bar Shop for purchase?

[TREASURE_PAVILION_DESCRIPTION]
Event Rules:
1. The Exquisite Treasure Chest event will be available from October 15th at 00:00 to October 28th at 24:00.
2. The event requires gold bars to open treasure chests. A single draw costs 1 gold bar, and a 10-draw costs 9 gold bars. Gold bars can be obtained through the event shop.
3. Each time a treasure chest is opened, there is a chance to receive a grand prize from the prize pool. After 30 draws, you are guaranteed a superior or higher prize; after 60 draws, you are guaranteed an epic or higher prize; after 90 draws, you are guaranteed a Legendary Reward 2 or higher; and after 180 draws, you are guaranteed a Legendary Reward 1 (only one item is awarded per draw).
4. When a grand prize is won, one of the prizes from all prize tiers will be awarded based on the probability.
5. Prize Overlap Rule: If multiple prizes trigger at the same time, higher-level prizes will override lower-level ones.
6. Prize Reset Rule: After receiving a higher-level prize, all guaranteed draws below (and including) that level will be reset.
7. Each legendary and epic prize can only be obtained once. After obtaining a prize, its probability will be evenly distributed among other grand prizes.
8. After the event ends, remaining gold bars will be cleared. Leftover gold bars will be converted into diamonds at a 1:30 ratio.
9. If a player wins an artifact they already own, the reward will automatically be converted into 1500 diamonds.

Prize Pool Probabilities:
Item (Probability)
Diamonds*30 (12%)
Diamonds*150 (5%)
Coins*50000 (13%)
Coins*80000 (7%)
Secret Treasure Voucher*1 (8%)
Rare Fertilizer Ornament*1 (9%)
Orange Cultivation Liquid*2 (10%)
Mystery Crystal*5000 (13%)
Mystery Crystal*20000 (8%)
Costume Voucher*50 (10%)
Grand Prize (5%)

Grand Prize Probabilities:
Legendary Grand Prizes:
Mulberry Blast Pirate Outfit (7%)  
Gourd artifact (13%)

Epic Grand Prizes:  
3000 Diamonds (5%)  
1 Advanced Book (5%)  
20 Mad Firecracker Flower Pieces (5%)  
20 Electric Peel Banana Pieces (5%)  
New Phonograph Mandrake Outfit (5%)  
20 Universal Pieces (5%)

Superior Grand Prizes:
Directional piece*30 (10%)
Electrified Pine Cone Plant piece*30 (10%)
Costume Voucher*1000 (10%)

Treasure Hunt

[ANNIVERSARY_TREASURE_BUY_FINISH]
Purchased

[ANNIVERSART_TREASURE_DESCRIPTION_TITLE]
Anniversary Treasure Hunt Instructions

[ANNIVERSART_TREASURE_DESCRIPTION]
Event Details:
1. Players break gold jars by spending gold bars, and breaking a jar will yield a reward.
2. When the broken gold jars form a line, the reward at the end of the line is awarded. Breaking all the jars grants the final reward.
3. The cost of purchasing gold bars with diamonds increases: 1-3 times costs 50 diamonds, 4-6 times costs 100 diamonds, and 7-9 times costs 150 diamonds.
4. When no gold jars remain, the rewards will automatically reset, with a limit on the number of resets.

[ANNIVERSART_TREASURE_SHORT_DESCRIPTION]
Come treasure hunt and hide the grand prize there! Get ^00FF00^Rare Plants^oldclr^Oh!

[HAPPY_VASE_BREAKER_TITLE]
Vase breaker: goodluck by evil :)

[HAPPY_VASE_BREAKER_TAB_ONE]
Vase breaker

[HAPPY_VASE_BREAKER_TAB_TWO]
Can Smashing Mission

[HAPPY_VASE_BREAKER_TEXT_1]
Number of hammer

[HAPPY_VASE_BREAKER_TEXT_NUM]
A

[HAPPY_VASE_BREAKER_POOL]
Prize pool
Preview

[HAPPY_VASE_BREAKER_RESET]
Reset

[HAPPY_VASE_BREAKER_HAMMER_ERROR]
Unknown activity error, check network connection or reopen activity

[HAPPY_VASE_BREAKER_DES_TITLE]
Vase breaker Instructions

[HAPPY_VASE_BREAKER_DESCRIPTION]
Activity content:
1. The player receives a bonus for smashing open the gold vase by the smashing vase hammer he owns.
2. When the remaining gold vase, the number is zero, the reward can be reset, otherwise it will need to consume the can smashing hammer to reset, and the reward card pool will be randomly selected from the reward when reset (there is a probability of resetting to the current card pool)
3. Smashing the hammer can be obtained through daily tasks, daily recharge, and cumulative recharge within the event page.
4. Daily tasks and daily recharges are reset daily.
5. The number of can smashing hammers consumed per can smash is inconsistent. The remaining can-smashing hammers in each issue are emptied.
6. If the player already owns the plants in the gold vase, the reward is converted into 10 plant pieces, and 15 Costume pieces are given if they own the Costume in the gold jar.
7. Each event has a first-class plant jackpot, which will not appear again in this event after the player has smashed the jackpot plant.
 
Announcement of the probability of breaking the vase
First Class Rewards: 2.06% Second Class Rewards: 6.18% Third Class Rewards: 9.36% Fourth Class Rewards: 26.22% Fifth Class Rewards: 56.18%

[FESTIVAL_GOLDENEGG_HAMMER_CONFIRM]
Does it consume {NUM} egg smashing hammer to smash open the golden egg

[FESTIVAL_GOLDENEGG_HAMMER_NOT_ENOUGH]
Insufficient egg hammer

[FESTIVAL_GOLDENEGG_DESCRIPTION_TITLE]
Egg smashing instructions

[FESTIVAL_GOLDENEGG_DESCRIPTION]
Activity content:
1. The player selects the level of the egg, and after selecting the egg-in-egg jackpot for that level, one bonus is awarded for each egg smashed open through the egg-smashing hammer he has.
2. When the player smashes their chosen grand prize, they can choose the next level of eggs. When the golden egg of the highest level is reached, after smashing the grand prize inside the golden egg, the reward for the golden egg of the highest level can be reset, and the player re-selects the grand prize.
3. Players can choose to move to the next level of eggs after smashing the optional grand prize in the current level of eggs, or continue smashing eggs in the current level until the number of eggs is emptied.
4. Egg-smashing hammers can be obtained by purchasing gift packs through daily tasks within the event page.
5. Daily tasks and daily recharges are reset daily.
6. Egg smashing consumes an increasing number of egg smashing hammers, with varying numbers of hammers required per layer.
7. The remaining egg-smashing hammers in each issue are emptied.
 
 
The probability of smashing eggs in the first four layers is announced
Grand Prize: 3.85% First Prize: 7.69%
Second Class Rewards: 11.54% Third Class Rewards: 19.23%
 4th Class Award: 26.92% 5th Class Award: 30.77%
 
Fifth tier egg smashing probability public
Grand Prize: 28.30% First Prize: 7.55%
Second Class Award: 11.32% Third Class Award: 11.32%
 4th Class Reward: 18.87% 5th Class Reward: 22.64%

[ARBORDAY_DESCRIPTION_TITLE]
Secret Realm Treasure Search

[ARBORDAY_DESCRIPTION]
Event content:

1. Every time three batteries are consumed, a treasure chest can be unlocked, granting a large amount of plant fragments, diamonds, coins, and other rewards. The available rewards are listed as follows: ^FF8000^Artifact Blessing Voucher, Festival Soda Coconut, Slime Eucalyptus Fruit^oldclr^ ^8600FF^Night Shadow Dragonberry, Oak Ice Fairy^oldclr^ ^2828FF^Primitive Nut, Asparagus Fighter, Mighty Cauliflower^oldclr^ ^82D900^Triple Shooter, Explosive Nut, Dendrobium Windbreak Net^oldclr^
2. Batteries can be obtained through charging tasks or purchased through diamond packages.
3. Every time a battery is consumed, it contributes to both personal and server-wide charging progress. Rewards can be claimed based on personal progress and the overall server progress! *

[GENE_TALENT_UPGRADE_COST_TIPS]
Upgrading will consume the gene sequence {NUM} level

[GENE_TALENT_TITLE_SHOOTER_1]
Attack power bonus - remote

[GENE_TALENT_DESCRIPTION_SHOOTER_1]
Attack power bonus effect provided to all remote plants

[GENE_DESCRIPTION_TITLE]
Gene editing gameplay instructions

[GENE_DESCRIPTION]
Gene Editing Gameplay Rules:
1. Gene sequences can be distilled in gene editing by consuming gene primacy. It can also be exchanged directly in the Gene Sequence Store by consuming Universal Gene Coins.
2. Each gene sequence can provide an addition effect to the corresponding plant after unlocking, and boost the addition value after upgrading, with a full level of 10.
3. Upgrading the gene sequence requires the gene essence corresponding to the plant, consuming 1 point of gene essence per level.
 
Rules for gene rendering:
1. The probability of rareness of the extracted gene sequence is announced: 30% for white gene sequence, 25% for green gene sequence, 20% for blue gene sequence, 15% for purple gene sequence, and 10% for orange gene sequence%.
2. The gene sequence that is first extracted will unlock the gene sequence; when extracted again, the gene essence corresponding to the plant will be converted; when extracted after full level, it will be converted into a universal gene coin.
3. The conversion quantity rules are: 13 white, 16 green, 19 blue, 22 purple, and 25 orange.
 
Gene Sequence Shop Rules:
1. Gene sequences differ in price according to rarity: 39 white, 48 green, 57 blue, 66 purple, 75 orange.
2. The gene sequence is available when unlocked; the gene essence is available when unlocked; the plant gene will disappear from the store when it is full.
 
Genetic primacy and universal gene coin acquisition pathways:
1. Each player is initially given 10 genetic primitives.
2. Genogenous primality is available through rank rewards in duels.
3. Genetic Primacy and Universal Genetic Coins are available through the purchase of gene gift packs and other paid gift packs.

[GENE_HOWTOPLAY_1_DESCRIPTION]
Plant gene editing can provide additional bonus effects to plants, making them more powerful and better guarding their homes against zombies!

[GENE_HOWTOPLAY_2_DESCRIPTION]
The consumed gene primates are processed in a gene refiner to obtain random gene sequences. If this gene sequence has been unlocked, it is converted to the gene essence.

[GENE_HOWTOPLAY_3_DESCRIPTION]
Gene essence is used to upgrade the gene sequence level of this plant, and the bonus value will also be increased after the level is upgraded, with a full level of 10.

[GENE_HOWTOPLAY_4_DESCRIPTION]
Get the Gene Essence again when you reach full level and buy the Gene Editing Gift Pack to get the Universal Gene Coin, and you can buy your favorite gene sequence directly in the store.

[GENE_DESCRIPTION_BEARBERRY]
The bear fruit mortar's ultimate move has a {Param_1}% probability of getting stuck and firing an extra shell in one random direction to the right

[GENE_DESCRIPTION_STREETLAMP]
Plantern health increase {Param_1}%

[GENE_DESCRIPTION_LAVAGUAVA]
Magma guava attack power increased {Param_1}%

[GENE_DESCRIPTION_IMPPEAR]
The probability of Xiao Huangli landing and releasing plants food at the fourth level increases {Param_1}%

[GENE_DESCRIPTION_POWERPLANT]
Tile radish reduces sun cost {Param_1}%

[GENE_DESCRIPTION_CACTUS]
The cactus' ultimate move strengthens the needle prick with additional current, and there is a {Param_1}% probability of zombie paralysis in the mission

[GENE_DESCRIPTION_TANGLEKELP]
Cooling time shortened for Tangle Kelp plants {Param_1}%

[GENE_DESCRIPTION_CHILIBEAN]
Croton planting cooling time shortened {Param_1}%

[GENE_DESCRIPTION_FIREPEASHOOTER]
Flame pea shooter attack power increased {Param_1}%

[GENE_DESCRIPTION_PINEAPPLE]
Spin pineapple health increase {Param_1}%

[GENE_DESCRIPTION_SQUASH]
The probability of not disappearing after the Squash attack and returning to the same place increases {Param_1}% (effective after level 2)

[GENE_DESCRIPTION_GATLINGPEA]
The Gatling Peas retains the auxiliary machine gun after plants food and fires 6 additional rounds of ammunition into each of the 3 rows on the right at each attack, which ends after {Param_1} attacks

[GENE_DESCRIPTION_MANGOSTEEN]
Juneng Mangosteen's ultimate move increases damage {Param_1}%

[GENE_DESCRIPTION_ICELOTUS]
Dripping ice lotus pool duration extended {Param_1}%

[GENE_DESCRIPTION_GOLDLEAF]
Golden leaf planting cooling time shortened {Param_1}%

[GENE_DESCRIPTION_ANTHURIUM]
The damage of the ionized anthurium large electric ball increases by {Param_1}%

[GENE_DESCRIPTION_HOMINGTHISTLE]
The probability of the guided thistle firing two bullets in succession increases {Param_1}% (effective after order 2)

[GENE_DESCRIPTION_AGAVE]
When attacking Agave, there is a {Param_1}% probability of exerting an additional sword energy consistent with the slash attack power, causing damage to the zombies in the 3rd to 5th squares on the right

[GENE_DESCRIPTION_HYDROCOTYLEDRUMMER]
The attack power and attack speed increase effect provided by the copper coin grass drummer for the orchestra's plants has increased {Param_1}%

[BATTLE_ORDER_DESCRIPTION_TITLE_AUTUMN]
Golden Autumn Outing Event Description

[BATTLE_ORDER_DESCRIPTION_TITLE_WINTER]
Winter Celebration Event Description

[BATTLE_ORDER_DESCRIPTION_TITLE_SPRINGFESTIVAL]
Happy New Year Event Description

[BATTLE_ORDER_DESCRIPTION_TITLE_SPRING]
Garden Flower Festival Event Description

[BATTLE_ORDER_DESCRIPTION_TITLE_SUMMER]
Cool Summer Event Description

[BATTLE_ORDER_DESCRIPTION_AUTUMN]
Activity rules:
1. Players gain experience by completing tasks in daily challenges, weekly challenges, and limited challenges. Each 500 experience collected can be promoted to the next level to obtain the corresponding level reward.
3. As the level increases, the rewards will be more generous. The first 50 levels of rewards include gems. After reaching level 50, you can continue to upgrade. The rewards are fixed in a cycle of level 10 and no more gems are produced.
4. Activating advanced benefits allows you to gain more rights in the "Golden Autumn Outing," including unlocking eligibility for rewards at advanced tiers, instantly leveling up by 10 levels, a 20% experience bonus from tasks, and 150 diamonds. The experience bonus from tasks only applies to experience gained after activation; experience received before activation will be awarded according to the original rules.
5. Using gems, you can participate in the turntable lottery in the treasure column and draw generous rewards. Up to level 50 and has activated the premium equity, it can empty all contents of the treasure turntable, a total of 20 items.
6. There is only one chance to receive all rewards in the treasure carousel. When a certain reward is open, its probability will be allocated to other unobtained rewards. When none of the 20 awards in the carousel are open, the probability of each award is as follows:
Gold coins 22.66%, diamonds 27.20%, pendants 19.26%, plants 24.25%, super pendants 2.04%, single draw coupons 4.53%, advanced books 0.06%.
7. Some level rewards and turntable rewards can be self-selected rewards. The contents of each self-selected gear in this event are as follows:
Green Quality Plants: Sweet Potato Triple Shooter, Melon-pult, Garlic, Cyclone Acorn
Blue Quality Plants: Chestnut Squad, Oak Archers, Pitaya, Spore Mushroom, Avocado
Purple Quality Plant 1: Electric Shock Blueberry, Dandelion, Coconut Cannon, Mistletoe Ice Fairy, Beet Guard
Purple Quality Plants 2: Kiwi, Copper Money Grass Drummer, Shadow Viburnum, Sneaking Open Arrow, Flame Mushroom
Orange Quality Plant 1: Ice Mushroom, Strong Sour Lemon, Hot Wasabi, Trumpet Flower, Current Gooseberry
Orange Quality Plant 2: Gatling Peas Shooter, Eggplant Ninja, Cat's Tail Grass, Ice dragon, Cob Cannon
Orange Quality Plants 3: Polymer Mangosteen, Piranha Pea, Olive Pit, Mulberry Blaster, Ground Saw Grass
Orange Quality Plants 4: Tyrant Dragon Fruit, Ice Mushroom, Strong Acid Lemon, Fiery Wasabi, Electric Currant
Blue quality pendant: ordinary fertilizer, ordinary iron bucket, ordinary telephone pole, ordinary medicine box, ordinary snowflake
Purple quality pendant: high-grade fertilizer, high-grade iron barrel, strong telephone poles, high-grade medicine box, refined snowflake
Orange quality pendant: rare fertilizer, time and space iron bucket, giant telephone pole, universal medicine box, shining snowflake
Flower pots and pieces of rare pendants: acceleration pots, spotlight pots, solar pots, little yellow duck swimming rings, energy saving tanks
Super Pendant 1: Denim Gloves, Moon Pot Helmet, Energy Saving Battery, White Candle, Princess Ice Crown
Super Pendant 2: Metal Slingshot, Big Firecracker, Acceleration Clock, Police Shock Stick, Pain Relief Agent

[BATTLE_ORDER_DESCRIPTION_WINTER]
Activity rules:
1. Players gain experience by completing tasks in daily challenges, weekly challenges, and limited challenges. Each 500 experience collected can be promoted to the next level to obtain the corresponding level reward.
2. As the level increases, the rewards will be more generous. The first 50 levels of rewards include gems. After reaching level 50, you can continue to upgrade. The rewards are fixed in a cycle of level 10 and no more gems are produced.
3. Activate high-level rights and interests, and you can obtain more rights and interests in the winter celebration acquisition, including unlocking the reward qualification for high-level positions, immediately increasing the level by 20 levels, obtaining an experience bonus of 20% on tasks, and 150 diamonds. Where the task acquisition bonus is effective only for experience collected after activation, and experience already collected before activation is issued according to the original rules.
4. Using gems, you can participate in the turntable lottery in the treasure column and draw generous rewards. Up to level 50 and has activated the premium equity, it can empty all contents of the treasure turntable, a total of 20 items.
5. There is only one chance to receive all rewards in the Treasure Roulette. When a certain reward is open, the probability will be allocated to other unobtained rewards. When none of the 20 awards in the carousel are open, the probability of each award is as follows:
Gold coins 22.66%, diamonds 27.20%, pendants 19.26%, plants 24.25%, super pendants 2.04%, single draw coupons 4.53%, advanced books 0.06%.
6. Some level rewards and turntable rewards can be self-selected rewards. The content of each self-selected gear in this event is as follows:
Green Quality Plants: Sweet Potato Triple Shooter, Melon-pult, Garlic, Cyclone Acorn
Blue Quality Plants: Chestnut Squad, Oak Archers, Pitaya, Spore Mushroom, Avocado
Purple Quality Plant 1: Electric Shock Blueberry, Dandelion, Coconut Cannon, Mistletoe Ice Fairy, Beet Guard
Purple Quality Plants 2: Kiwi, Copper Money Grass Drummer, Shadow Viburnum, Sneaking Open Arrow, Flame Mushroom
Orange Quality Plant 1: Ice Mushroom, Strong Sour Lemon, Hot Wasabi, Trumpet Flower, Current Gooseberry
Orange Quality Plant 2: Gatling Peas Shooter, Eggplant Ninja, Cat's Tail Grass, Ice dragon, Cob Cannon
Orange Quality Plants 3: Polymer Mangosteen, Piranha Pea, Olive Pit, Mulberry Blaster, Ground Saw Grass
Orange quality plants 4: twin rabbits, ice mushrooms, strong sour lemons, hot wasabi, electric currants
Blue quality pendant: ordinary fertilizer, ordinary iron bucket, ordinary telephone pole, ordinary medicine box, ordinary snowflake
Purple quality pendant: high-grade fertilizer, high-grade iron barrel, strong telephone poles, high-grade medicine box, refined snowflake
Orange quality pendant: rare fertilizer, time and space iron bucket, giant telephone pole, universal medicine box, shining snowflake
Flower pots and pieces of rare pendants: acceleration pots, spotlight pots, solar pots, little yellow duck swimming rings, energy saving tanks

Super Pendant 2: Metal Slingshot, Big Firecracker, Acceleration Clock, Police Shock Stick, Pain Relief Agent

Activity rules:
1. Players gain experience by completing tasks in daily challenges, weekly challenges, and limited challenges. Each 500 experience collected can be promoted to the next level to obtain the corresponding level reward.
2. As the level increases, the rewards will be more generous. The first 50 levels of rewards include gems. After reaching level 50, you can continue to upgrade. The rewards are fixed in a cycle of level 10 and no more gems are produced.
3. Activating advanced privileges allows you to gain more benefits in the "Golden Autumn Outing” event, including unlocking the reward eligibility for higher tiers, an immediate level-up of 20 levels, a 20% experience bonus for tasks, and 150 diamonds. Note that the experience bonus for tasks only applies to experience gained after activation; experience received before activation will be distributed according to the original rules.
4. Using gems, you can participate in the turntable lottery in the treasure column and draw generous rewards. Up to level 50 and has activated the premium equity, it can empty all contents of the treasure turntable, a total of 20 items.
5. There is only one chance to receive all rewards in the Treasure Roulette. When a certain reward is open, the probability will be allocated to other unobtained rewards. When none of the 20 awards in the carousel are open, the probability of each award is as follows:

[BATTLE_ORDER_DESCRIPTION_IOS_1_AUTUMN]
Flash sale points gift activity rules:
The first 500 players who purchase premium interests can participate
The initial prize pool is 10,000 diamonds, and the number of diamonds in the premium equity prize pool is +100 for every 1 player who purchases it
The first 1-50 people who purchase each receive 0.5% of the total prize pool, totaling 25%
The first 51-150 purchases each receive 0.25% of the total prize pool, totaling 25%
The first 151-300 purchases each receive 0.2% of the total prize pool, totaling 30%
The first 301-500 purchases each receive 0.1% of the total prize pool, totaling 20%
Golden Autumn Lucky Star Event Rules:
Players who purchase premium interests can participate
The initial prize pool is 35,000 diamonds, and the number of diamonds in the premium equity prize pool is +35 for every 1 player who purchases it
At the end of the event, 1 first prize will be open and 20% of the total prize pool will be awarded%
2 second prize winners are open to receive 10% of the total prize pool, totaling 20%
The 4 third prize winners are open to receive 5% of the total prize pool, totaling 20%
The 100 fourth prize winners are open to receive 0.4% of the total prize pool, totaling 40%

[BATTLE_ORDER_DESCRIPTION_ANDROID_1_AUTUMN]
Activity Description:
Level rewards and turntable rewards can only be collected within the event period and will expire after the event.
Emerald gemstones are only used during the current event period and will be cleared after expiration
 
Flash sale points gift activity rules:
The first 500 players who purchase premium interests can participate
The initial prize pool is 4000 diamonds, and the number of diamonds in the premium equity prize pool is +40 for every 1 player who purchases it
The first 1-50 people who purchase each receive 0.5% of the total prize pool, totaling 25%
The first 51-150 purchases each receive 0.25% of the total prize pool, totaling 25%
The first 151-300 purchases each receive 0.2% of the total prize pool, totaling 30%
The first 301-500 purchases each receive 0.1% of the total prize pool, totaling 20%
Golden Autumn Lucky Star Event Rules:
Players who purchase premium interests can participate
The initial prize pool is 14,000 diamonds, and the number of diamonds in the premium equity prize pool is +14 for every 1 player who purchases it
At the end of the event, 1 first prize will be open and 20% of the total prize pool will be awarded%
 2 second prize winners are open to receive 10% of the total prize pool, totaling 20%
The 4 third prize winners are open to receive 5% of the total prize pool, totaling 20%
The 100 fourth prize winners are open to receive 0.4% of the total prize pool, totaling 40%

Activity Description:
