[PVZ2_UNCHARTED_MODE_TIPS_TITLE]
Tip

[PVZ2_UNCHARTED_MODE_TALE_2_HARD_TIPS_DESC]
The Boss level unlock condition of difficult mode is to unlock the front 7 knots using key

[PVZ2_UNCHARTED_MODE_TALE_2_NORMAL_TIPS_DESC]
Please complete the front level first.

[PVZ2_UNCHARTED_MODE_TIPS_DESC]
1. There are a variety of different new worlds and new zombies waiting for you to explore in the secret realm of time and space, each with normal and difficult levels.
2. Levels in normal and difficult modes have first pass rewards and normal pass rewards respectively. The first pass reward is obtained when the first pass is completed and cannot be collected repeatedly.
3. Unlock difficult mode levels after clearing all normal mode levels.
4. Difficult levels require consuming the spatio-temporal key to unlock.
5. The difficulty mode has additional challenge goals. Once achieved, you will receive an exclusive badge for this secret chapter. Failure to achieve it will not affect normal clearance.
6. Exclusive badges accumulate to a certain number to receive additional rewards, which include plant pieces with collection rewards.

[PVZ2_UNCHARTED_MODE_TIPS_DESC_UNCHARTED_ICEAGE]
1. There are a variety of different new worlds and new zombies waiting for you to explore in the secret realm of time and space, each with normal and difficult levels.
2. Levels in normal and difficult modes have first pass rewards and normal pass rewards respectively. The first pass reward is obtained when the first pass is completed and cannot be collected repeatedly.
3. Unlock difficult mode levels after clearing all normal mode levels.
4. Difficult levels are unlocked as time progresses.
5. Difficult mode has specific challenge goals. Check the challenge goals to complete the task to get rewards. Failure to achieve it will not affect normal clearance.
6. The normal mode contains 3 challenge objectives fixedly, and the reward corresponding to this objective is obtained by completing the challenge objective for the first time

[PVZ2_UNCHARTED_MODE_TIPS_DESC_UNCHARTED_CHILDRENSDAY]
There are a variety of new worlds and new zombies waiting for you to explore, and each world has ordinary and difficult levels.
2. General and difficult mode levels have the first prize and normal customs clearance, the first prize is obtained at the first customs clearance, and can not be reciprocated repeatedly.
3.General mode level all after customs clearance unlocks difficult mode level.
4. Difficult levels push the unlock over time.
5.Difficult mode has specific challenge goals, select the challenge target to complete the task can be rewarded, failure to achieve the normal customs clearance.
6. Ordinary mode fixed contains 3 challenge goals, and for the first time to complete the challenge goal can receive the reward for that goal

[PVZ2_UNCHARTED_MODE_TIPS_DESC_UNCHARTED_ARBORDAY]
1. There are a variety of different new worlds and new zombies waiting for you to explore in the secret realm of time and space, each with normal and difficult levels.
2. Levels in normal and difficult modes have first pass rewards and normal pass rewards respectively. The first pass reward is obtained when the first pass is completed and cannot be collected repeatedly.
3. Unlock difficult mode levels after clearing all normal mode levels.
4. Difficult levels are unlocked as time progresses.
5. Difficult mode has specific challenge goals. Check the challenge goals to complete the task to get rewards. Failure to achieve it will not affect normal clearance.
6. The normal mode contains 3 challenge objectives fixedly, and the reward corresponding to this objective is obtained by completing the challenge objective for the first time

[PVZ2_UNCHARTED_MODE_KEY_TIPS_DESC]
1. Consuming 1 spoon of time and space can unlock a difficult level
2. Automatically get 1 spatio-temporal spoon every day. At the time of reaching the upper storage limit, it does not increase any more.
3. The storage limit of the spatio-temporal key is 5.

Snowball attack

[PVZ2_UNCHARTED_MODE_MODE_DESC_SNOWBALL]
Snowballs, formed by the harsh weather characteristic of winter, will only be melted by flames, beware that some zombies will push them

[PVZ2_UNCHARTED_MODE_MODE_TITLE_KONGMINGLIGHT]
Kongming lamp

[PVZ2_UNCHARTED_MODE_MODE_DESC_KONGMINGLIGHT]
Many Kongming lights float from nowhere, which burn plants and make the grid unplantable when it crashes, the effects of which are avoided by attacking to cause it to crash early

Ice-cream car

[PVZ2_UNCHARTED_MODE_MODE_DESC_ICECREAMCAR]
Children's Day zombies come in their favorite ice cream truck, and knocking out the ice cream truck will release the zombies in it, using ground spines can be miraculous.

Mandrake Cool Run

[PVZ2_UNCHARTED_MODE_MODE_DESC_RUNNING]

[PVZ2_UNCHARTED_MODE_MODE_TITLE_CHILDREN1]
Elite touch car zombies come on

[PVZ2_UNCHARTED_MODE_MODE_DESC_CHILDREN1]
Elite Bumper Car Zombies have a unique resilience mechanism. While their resilience bar is not broken, they have high damage reduction. When the resilience bar is broken, the zombies enter a downed state. Electric attacks can reduce resilience value, with paralysis attacks being especially effective.

[ACCOUNT_REMOVE_CONTENT_1]
Dear player, you are in the process of deleting your account. Continuing will result in:
1. Your diamonds, coins, plants, avatars, accessories, artifacts, fragments, tokens, items, and other in-game assets being deleted.
2. Your game data for world levels, hard levels, Penny's Pursuit, Endless Challenge, Super Z League, Secret Realm, Plant Families, Memory Journey, Creative Garden, and other modes being deleted.
3. Your account information will be deleted and cannot be recovered.

If this was an accidental action, please click the top-right corner to close, and your game data will be retained.

[ACCOUNT_REMOVE_CONTENT_2]
Your account will enter a 10-day freeze period. After selecting the freeze period, your account will be deactivated for 10 days.
During these 10 days, you can log in and cancel the freeze on your own.

[ACCOUNT_REMOVE_CONTENT_3]
1. After account deletion, all game data and virtual items will be permanently removed!!
2. You will no longer be able to log in with this game account!!

If you understand, please click 【Confirm and Submit】. Once the account deletion request is submitted, it cannot be undone! Our staff will proceed with the deletion process, please be patient!

[ACCOUNT_REMOVE_CONTENT_4]
Your account: {ACCOUNT}

This account has applied for deletion on {TIME}, and the account will be officially deleted within 30 days from the application date.

[ACCOUNT_REMOVE_CONTENT_5]
Your account: {ACCOUNT}

This account is in a deactivated state and will be deleted on {TIME}. If this was an accidental deletion, please click 【Restore Account】 to return to the game.

[ACCOUNT_REMOVE_CONTENT_6]
Your account has been deleted. Please create a new account to start playing.

[LAUNCH_MISSILE]
Launch Missile

[LAUNCH_MISSILE_DES]
Can be released over any area of the field, causing high damage to enemies within 1 tile and reduced damage to elite enemies.

[NORMAL_GRAVESTONE]
Normal Gravestone

[NORMAL_GRAVESTONE_DES]
Creates a Normal Gravestone in a designated tile. Upgrading it will make it produce higher-level zombies.

[CHICKEN_ZOMBIE]
Mini Zombie Chicken

[CHICKEN_ZOMBIE_DES]
Selects a 3x3 area and summons 20 Mini Zombie Chickens within the area.

[FUTURE_GARGANTUAR_ZOMBIE]
Future Gargantuar Zombie

[FUTURE_GARGANTUAR_ZOMBIE_DES]
Summons 1 Future Gargantuar Zombie.

[CHICKEN_GRAVESTONE]
Chicken Gravestone

[CHICKEN_GRAVESTONE_DES]
Creates a Chicken Gravestone in a designated tile. After 3 upgrades, it will start producing Skunks.

[RAGE_POTION]
Rage Potion

[RAGE_POTION_DES]
Can be released over any area of the field, increasing the attack power and speed of friendly units within a 1-tile range by 100%.

[SHIELD_POTION]
Shield Potion

[SHIELD_POTION_DES]
Can be released over any area of the field, making friendly units within a 3x3 range invincible for 10 seconds.

[GRAVESTONE_UPGRADE]
Gravestone Upgrade

[GRAVESTONE_UPGRADE_DES]
Selects one of our gravestones and upgrades it, causing it to produce zombies of a higher tier.

[CAVALRY_ZOMBIE_DES]

[SHOOTER_GRAVESTONE_DES]

[PROTECTOR_ZOMBIE_DES]

[FIREWALL]
Firewall

[FIREWALL_DES]

[MAGIC_MIRROR]
Magic Mirror

[MAGIC_MIRROR_DES]
Create a magic mirror within a designated lattice that will copy all the large zombies in our side that pass through once

Zombie clone

[ZOMBIE_DUPLICATE_DES]

[WORLD_CARD_GAME_RESET_TEXT]
Is it starting to re-challenge? A re-challenge removes the cards obtained by clearing the level, while resetting the level to an unopened state without affecting the level stars already obtained.

[CARD_GAME_TUTORIAL_STEP_1]
In this mode a brand new elite enemy will appear, which can be won by defeating it.
 (Click anywhere to proceed to the next step)

[CARD_GAME_TUTORIAL_STEP_2]
After the zombies enter our base, they will only deduct a certain durability, which will fail when the durability is 0.
 (Click anywhere to proceed to the next step)

[CARD_GAME_TUTORIAL_STEP_3]
Fighting in this mode is played in rounds, with 5 cards open from the deck as hands at the beginning of each round.
 (Click anywhere to proceed to the next step)

[CARD_GAME_TUTORIAL_STEP_4]
Long press card to enlarge card.
 (Long press the card to enlarge the card according to the instructions, and proceed to the next step after release)

[CARD_GAME_TUTORIAL_STEP_5]
Drag the card onto the field to get it into battle.
 (Drag the card to the field according to instructions and use the card to proceed to the next step)

[CARD_GAME_TUTORIAL_STEP_6]
Each card consumes the corresponding sun, but don't worry, the sun will be full every turn.
 (Click anywhere to proceed to the next step)

[CARD_GAME_TUTORIAL_STEP_7]
Elite enemies release their unique skills at the end of each turn, clicking Intent for details.
 (Click anywhere to proceed to the next step)

[CARD_GAME_TUTORIAL_STEP_8]
After the click round, the round can be ended, and the remaining hand cards are discarded into the cemetery. If the time is too long, the round will be automatically ended.
 (Click the End of Round button to proceed to the next step)

[CARD_GAME_TUTORIAL_STEP_9]
Let's start by playing the zombie clone card that doubles the number of summoned zombie cards the next two times.
 (Drag the card to the field according to instructions and use the card to proceed to the next step)

[CARD_GAME_TUTORIAL_STEP_10]
The card Zombie Chicken is then played to summon a large number of zombie chickens.
 (Drag the card to the designated position shown in the icon according to the instructions, and use the card to proceed to the next step)

[CARD_GAME_TUTORIAL_STEP_11]
That's now, play the shield potion to prevent our zombie chickens from being attacked by the enemy's defensive towers and win in one go.
 (Drag the card to the designated position shown in the icon according to the instructions, and use the card to proceed to the next step)

[CARD_GAME_MODE_TITLE_SHIELD]

[CARD_GAME_MODE_DESC_SHIELD]

[PLANT_ADV_BUY_GEM_FINISH]

[PLANT_ADV_BUY_GEM_FINISH_COUNT]

[LEFT_AD_COUNT]

[NEWPVP_HOWTOPLAY_1_DESCRIPTION]  
This is a 1v1 duel mode where both players compete in real-time on the same lawn.  

[NEWPVP_HOWTOPLAY_2_DESCRIPTION]  
In this mode, plant level are marked in the top-left corner of their slots. No external bonuses (artifacts, family buffs, ornaments, costumes, or genes) apply.  

[NEWPVP_HOWTOPLAY_3_DESCRIPTION]  
The top lawn is your area, and the bottom lawn is your opponent. Defend your lawn by planting plants and attack the opponent's lawn by deploying zombies. Zombies crossing the opponent's baseline reduce their HP. The game ends when one player's HP reaches zero.  

[NEWPVP_HOWTOPLAY_4_DESCRIPTION]  
The sunflower icon in the top-left corner generates sun. Spend sun to increase its production and raise your plant limit.  

[NEWPVP_HOWTOPLAY_5_DESCRIPTION]  
As rounds progress, more powerful zombies and skills unlock. Strategically combine them for an easier path to victory.  

[NEWPVP_ARMY_HOWTOPLAY_1_DESCRIPTION]  
Here, you can freely train your zombie army.  

[NEWPVP_ARMY_HOWTOPLAY_2_DESCRIPTION]  
Zombie cards obtained from chests help you unlock and upgrade zombies.  

[NEWPVP_ARMY_HOWTOPLAY_3_DESCRIPTION]  
Cards with matching round limits can be swapped with each other.

[NEW_PVP_COMBAT_UI_ROUND_COUNTER]
Round {COUNTER}

[NEW_PVP_SEEDPACKET_LOCKED_DES]
Unlocks in Round {NUMBER}

[NEW_PVP_AREA_NONE_NAME]
Basic Terrain Theme

[NEW_PVP_AREA_NONE_DESCRIPTION]
No additional terrain mechanisms on the field.

[NEW_PVP_AREA_SLIDER_NAME]
Floating Board Terrain Theme

[NEW_PVP_AREA_SLIDER_DESCRIPTION]
Several floating boards appear on the field. Zombies stepping on the boards will change rows according to the direction indicated by the boards.

[NEW_PVP_AREA_MIST_NAME]
Fog Terrain Theme

[NEW_PVP_AREA_MIST_DESCRIPTION]
Fog covering several rows appears on the field. The fog obscures the line of sight, concealing the specific positions of zombies.

[NEW_PVP_AREA_GUIDE_DOOR_NAME]
Tunnel Terrain Theme

[NEW_PVP_AREA_GUIDE_DOOR_DESCRIPTION]
Pairs of tunnels appear on the field. When zombies enter the tunnel, they will appear directly from the other end.

[NEW_PVP_AREA_MERGE_NAME]
Fusion Theme

[NEW_PVP_AREA_MERGE_DESCRIPTION]
When there are 3 or more zombies of the same type on the field, a fusion effect will be triggered after a short preparation time. Multiple zombies merge into a large zombie. The fused zombie becomes larger, inheriting the blood volume and attack power of the zombies before fusion, and is considered immune to control effects as an elite zombie.

[NEW_PVP_TASK]
Task

[NEW_PVP_TASK1]

[NEW_PVP_TASK_TAB1]

[NEW_PVP_TASK_TAB2]

[NEW_PVP_TASK_TAB3]
Lucky Wheel

[NEW_PVP_TASK_INTERGAL]
Duel Coins

[NEW_PVP_TASK_INTERGAL_TIPS]
Currently have {NUM} Duel Coins

[NEW_PVP_TASK_DESCRIPTION_TITLE]
Task Activity Instructions

[NEW_PVP_TASK_DESCRIPTION]
Activity Rules:

[NEW_PVP_TASK_DESCRIPTION_21]
1. Complete daily and weekly tasks to earn XP. Every 1000 XP levels you up with rewards.
2. Each day, 3 new tasks are added if slots are empty, without affecting progress.
3. Weekly tasks unlock over 4 weeks and remain completable until the season ends.
4. Higher levels grant better rewards. Levels 1–50 include Duel Coins. After level 50, rewards cycle every 10 levels, but no Duel Coins. Coins expire after the season.
5. Activate Premium Access to unlock premium rewards, boost task XP by 20%, and instantly receive 270 Duel Coins and the season plant.
6. Use Duel Coins in the "Lucky Spin" for rewards. With Premium Access and up to level 50, you can clear all Treasure Spin rewards.
7. Treasure Spin rewards can only be claimed once. When drawn, their probability redistributes. Initial probabilities:
Gold 22.67%, Diamonds 22.66%, Ornament 19.26%, Green Plant 11.33%, Blue Plant 7.93%, Purple Plant 11.33%, Orange Plant 2.49%, Super Ornament 2.04%, Vine & Costume Box 0.23%, Advanced Book 0.06%.

[NEW_PVP_TASK_DESCRIPTION_22]
1. Complete daily and weekly tasks to earn XP. Every 1000 XP levels you up with rewards.
2. Each day, 3 new tasks are added if slots are empty, without affecting progress.
3. Weekly tasks unlock over 4 weeks and remain completable until the season ends.
4. Higher levels grant better rewards. Levels 1–50 include Duel Coins. After level 50, rewards cycle every 10 levels, but no Duel Coins. Coins expire after the season.
5. Activate Premium Access to unlock premium rewards, boost task XP by 20%, and instantly receive 270 Duel Coins and the season plant.
6. Use Duel Coins in the "Lucky Spin" for rewards. With Premium Access and up to level 50, you can clear all Treasure Spin rewards.
7. Treasure Spin rewards can only be claimed once. When drawn, their probability redistributes. Initial probabilities:
Gold 22.67%, Diamonds 22.66%, Ornament 19.26%, Green Plant 11.33%, Blue Plant 7.93%, Purple Plant 11.33%, Orange Plant 2.49%, Super Ornament 2.04%, Vine & Costume Box 0.23%, Advanced Book 0.06%.

[NEW_PVP_TASK_NAME_1_7]

[NEW_PVP_SHOP]  
Two-Player Duel Shop

[NEW_PVP_SHOP_INFO_TITLE]  
Two-Player Duel Shop Rules

[NEW_PVP_SHOP_INFO_DETAIL]  
1. Shop items refresh daily at 00:00 (UTC+8) , resetting item purchase limits.  
2. Amethyst Coins can be obtained through daily and weekly chests and used to exchange for various items in the shop.  
3. Seasonal Legendary Chests and Seasonal Normal Chests usually contain newly introduced zombies for the season.  
4. The Seasonal Legendary Chest rewards include 310 cards of a random common zombie, 100 cards of a rare zombie, 5 cards of a legendary zombie, and 10 Amethyst Coins from the pool.  
5. The Seasonal Normal Chest rewards include 50 cards of a random common zombie, 15 cards of a rare zombie, 3 Amethyst Coins, and 60 diamonds.

[NEW_PVP_SHOP_RESET_TIMER]  
Shop Reset Countdown

[WORLD_LEVEL_PACKAGE_TITLE]
Penny's Journey

[WORLD_LEVEL_PACKAGE_TIPS_TITLE]
Activity Description

[WORLD_LEVEL_PACKAGE_TIPS_DESC]
1.  Gift pack opening follows the progress of the world, offering gift packs with different contents at different stages in different worlds.
2.  Gift pack opening requires the player to collect the stars within the level.
3.  The gift pack is open for a limited time of 3 days, after the end it will no longer be displayed and cannot be purchased.

Cornucopia  

[CORNUCOPIA_TAB_NAME2]  
Level Tasks

[CORNUCOPIA_TAB_NAME5]  
Prize Pool Distribution  

[CORNUCOPIA_GOTO_LEVEL]  
Upgrade  

[CORNUCOPIA_LEVEL_DESC]  
{NUM1} / {NUM2}


[CORNUCOPIA_MAIN_TIPS_INFO]
Rules:
1. Earn Lucky Coins by collecting or purchasing bundles. Use them in the event for rewards. Coins are valid only during the event.
2. Each draw grants Badges and random rewards, with a chance to win 5000 Diamonds.

Reward Probabilities:
Badge 1: 50%, 2: 35%, 3: 15%
Diamonds ×10: 24.99%, 30: 8.33%, 50: 4.16%, 5000: 0.05%
Orange Piece 1: 8.33%, Purple 2: 12.49%, Blue 2: 16.66%, Green 5: 24.99%.

3. Purchase Lucky Bundles for extra Coins, EXP, and Diamonds.
4. Level up the Cornucopia via tasks or bundles. Higher levels boost Coin generation and unlock slots. Levels reset after the event.
5. Free Coins generate periodically and can be claimed by collecting bubbles. Max 5 bubbles.
6. Use Badges to redeem items in the store. Some require specific Cornucopia levels. Badges expire after the event.
7. Each draw adds Diamonds to a global pool. At event end, players ranked share the pool:
Ranks 1-50: 0.5% each (200+ draws), 51-150: 0.25% (160+), 151-300: 0.2% (120+), 301-500: 0.1% (80+).

[CORNUCOPIA_PROGRESS_TIPS_INFO]
After 10 Cornucopia draws, the diamond count in the pool increases by 1.

[PRODUCT_PLANT_CULTIVATE_20_SHORTDESC]
Plant Cultivation Purchase Restriction Gift Pack

[INVITATION_MAIN_TIPS_INFO]
1. The duration of this event is from July 8th to August 31st.
2. Clear the Mystery of Egypt on the sixth day, you can recruit players
3. During the event, tokens can be obtained through recruitment tasks or through daily sharing, and tokens can be rewarded in recruitment drawings;
After each event, stores are closed and redundant tokens are cleared for recycling
4. Rules of recruitment:
Invited players need to create new accounts during the event and clears the mysterious Egyptian sixth day
(Each eligible player can only be recruited once)
Recruited players fill in the invitation code, deemed as a recruitment success, and received a reward immediately;
Each player can recruit multiple players (up to 100 players);
The invitation code Android and iOS are not interconnected, the Android invitation code is only available to Android players, and the ios invitation code is only available to invite players.

[DAVEKITCHEN_DESCRIPTION_TITLE]
Dave Kitchen Events

[Davekitchen_DESCRIPTION]
1. After completing multiple pattern levels (pursuit, double, endless, memory) challenge during the event, you can pick up corn and water in Dave's kitchen daily task, reset the task after 24 o'clock daily
2. Players can make various corn rolls through various ingredients, and after the production is completed, you can get Dave's gift, the specific probability is:
Grilled Meat Taco: (1) Artifact Blessing Ticket 40%, (2) Targeted Piece 30%, (3) Flame Fern Piece 30%
Smoked Meat Taco: (1) Artifact Blessing Ticket 40%, (2) Dracaena Draco Piece 30%, (3) Orange Nutrient 30%
Vegetable Corn Roll: (1) 100 Diamonds 40% (2) Thorny Meteor Hammer Piece 40% (3) Purple Nutrient Solution 20%
Corn roll: (1) 30 diamonds 40% (2) holographic nut pieces 40% (3) blue nutrient fluid 20%
3. The remaining ingredients can be exchanged for corresponding diamonds and gold coins props in the production interface. Excess food is not accumulated until the next period, please redeem as soon as possible.

[PARTY_ASSIST_ACTIVITY_COLLECTION_DESC]
Participate in party assistance, help climb levels, win various rare rewards, and have a chance to get ultra-rare costumes

[PARTY_ASSIST_TIPS_DESC]
Rules of Activity:
1. Before the help begins, please select 3 self-selected rewards, the selected reward will be obtained probably when the corresponding number of layers is reached.
2. Added a new rule for returning full-body costumes: after accumulating 3 rounds of assistance reaching 10 levels, you are guaranteed to receive the selected limited costume.
3. After each assistance reaches 10 levels, you can reset the selected rewards. When players reach level 5 or above, they can manually reset the lottery.
4. Complete a limited task can receive a rich reward, and the task's requirements are costume in the self-selected reward.
5.The progress of the event and the token will not be inherited until the next period, and the remaining tokens will be converted to diamonds at 1:10 ratio.
6. After the event, you need to choose the corresponding token icon in the backpack, click the prop exchange button to convert to diamonds, please timely exchange, the remaining tokens in the current period will be emptied when the next activity version is launched.

[PENNY_GIFT_SHORT_DESCRIPTION]
Open Penny's Future Gift Box for great rewards

[PENNY_GIFT_DESCRIPTION_TITLE]
Penny's Future Gift Box Event Details

[PENNY_GIFT_DESCRIPTION]
1. In the custom configuration, click on Penny's avatar on the left to select the type of Future Gift Box. Then, randomly choose eight gift boxes from the selected configurations to make up the rewards for this round (at least three reward categories must be selected).
2. Players can spend Penny's coins to purchase Future Gift Boxes and receive corresponding rewards. When purchasing Future Gift Boxes, Penny will offer discounts based on the number of gift boxes already purchased in the current round.
3. Each time a Future Gift Box is purchased, in addition to the fixed items, there will be an additional probability-based reward. To receive more prizes and diamonds, click the "?" button in the top right corner of the Future Gift Box for details.
4. Accumulating multiple Future Gift Boxes purchases can unlock personal progress rewards. The more tokens used to buy Future Gift Boxes, the more generous the rewards.
5. Purchasing Future Gift Boxes contributes to the server-wide progress, unlocking server-wide rewards. At least one Future Gift Box must be purchased to claim the server-wide rewards.
6. After spending Penny's coins to buy Future Gift Boxes, you will be ranked on the leaderboard based on the total price of the purchased boxes. Ranking on the leaderboard will earn additional substantial rewards upon settlement.
7. Any unspent Penny's coins will be automatically converted into corresponding diamond rewards at a 1:10 ratio after the event ends and cannot be carried over to the next event.
8. The probability of additional outputs in various categories is as follows: 
Enhancement Materials: 33.33% 
Plants and Plant Costumes: 10.00%

[NFS_LINKAGE_TAB1]
7-Day Sign-In

[NFS_LINKAGE_TAB2]
Racing Missions

[NFS_LINKAGE_TAB3]
Exchange Shop

[NFSLINKAGE_DESCRIPTION_TITLE]
Racing Battle Event Details

[NFSLINKAGE_DESCRIPTION]
Event Rules:
1. Players can claim valuable rewards daily during the event login period, with rewards available for 7 days of sign-in.
2. Racing missions are divided into daily tasks and event tasks. Daily tasks reset at midnight each day and can be completed once daily.
3. Event tasks consist of multiple stages, with each subsequent stage revealed after completing the previous one.
4. Completing racing missions earns Speed Gears, which can be used to exchange for item rewards in the Exchange Shop.
5. Item exchanges in the Exchange Shop are only available during the event period, so make sure to exchange items in a timely manner.

[MAT_NFSLINKAGE_INTEGRAL]
Speed Gear

[NFSLINKAGE_TITLE]
Racing Battle

[MAT_NFSLINKAGE_TICKET]
Speed Gear

[ACTIVITY_NFSLINKAGE_REASURE_SHORT_DESCRIPTION]
During the event, players can claim valuable rewards daily upon logging in, and completing event missions earns Speed Gears, which can be exchanged for great rewards in the Exchange Shop!

[PLANTWARS_MODE_HOWTOPLAY_1_DESCRIPTION]
The event starts at 14:00 on September 29th and ends at 00:00 on December 21st.

[PLANTWARS_MODE_HOWTOPLAY_2_DESCRIPTION]  
Zombies with attributes will receive additional buffs, handle with care.

[PLANTWARS_MODE_HOWTOPLAY_3_DESCRIPTION]  
When plants die or are removed, they will leave behind a high-health tombstone that will automatically decay after 5 seconds.

[PLANTWARS_MODE_HOWTOPLAY_4_DESCRIPTION]  
Use pea-type plants to deal damage and accumulate Pea Rain charge.

[PLANTWARS_MODE_HOWTOPLAY_5_DESCRIPTION]  
When fully charged, Pea Rain will fall, dealing damage to zombies while ignoring attributes and damage reduction effects.

[PLANTWARS_MODE_HOWTOPLAY_6_DESCRIPTION]  
Similar to normal mode, prevent zombies from eating your brain and unlock the next level after clearing.

[PLANTWARS_MODE_HOWTOPLAY_7_DESCRIPTION]  
Earn points by defeating zombies, and accumulate points to receive star rewards.

[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_ICEAGE_HUNTER_ELITE]  
Elite Hunter Zombie

[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_ICEAGE_HUNTER_ELITE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]  
The Elite Hunter Zombie has a toughness bar mechanism. Fire attribute attacks can reduce its toughness (burning attacks can cause significant reductions). Emptying the toughness bar will cause the zombie to enter a weakened state, during which it will neither act nor attack until the toughness bar is restored. When the zombie has toughness, it provides a damage absorption limit effect.

[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_ICEAGE_HUNTER_ELITE_DESCRIPTION]  
Actually, zombies also hold sports events every 4 years. The Elite Hunter Zombie has won the championship from the first event to... um... which edition is it now? In any case, it is the champion among champions.

[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_ICEAGE_WEASELHOARDER_ELITE]  
Elite Ice Weasel Zombie

[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_ICEAGE_WEASELHOARDER_ELITE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]  
The Elite Ice Weasel Zombie has a toughness bar mechanism. Fire attribute attacks can reduce its toughness (burning attacks can cause significant reductions). Emptying the toughness bar will cause the zombie to enter a weakened state, during which it will neither act nor attack until the toughness bar is restored. When the zombie has toughness, it provides a damage absorption limit effect.

[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_ICEAGE_WEASELHOARDER_ELITE_DESCRIPTION]  
One day, the Ice Weasel Zombie found a new hollow piece of wood and discovered a frozen squirrel with two sharp fangs inside. Next to it was a pine cone. The Ice Weasel Zombie and the weasel nibbled on the pine cone, and then they became Elite Ice Weasel Zombies.

[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_ICEAGE_CHIEF_ELITE]  
Elite Icewind Chieftain Zombie

[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_ICEAGE_CHIEF_ELITE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]  
The Elite Icewind Chieftain Zombie has a toughness bar mechanism. Fire attribute attacks can reduce its toughness (burning attacks can cause significant reductions). Emptying the toughness bar will cause the zombie to enter a weakened state, during which it will neither act nor attack until the toughness bar is restored. When the zombie has toughness, it provides a damage absorption limit effect.

[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_ICEAGE_CHIEF_ELITE_DESCRIPTION]  
After a routine attack, the Icewind Chieftain Zombie discovered that the guy in the cave with the flat-bottomed pot took out a fan device. The Icewind Chieftain Zombie was blown away by it. After being blown away repeatedly, the Icewind Chieftain Zombie has now learned how to counter the fan device.

[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_ICEYEARMONSTER]  
Frost Year Beast Zombie

[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_ICEYEARMONSTER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]  
The Frost Year Beast Zombie has a toughness bar mechanism. Fire attribute attacks can reduce its toughness (burning attacks can cause significant reductions). Emptying the toughness bar will cause the zombie to enter a weakened state, during which it will neither act nor attack until the toughness bar is restored. When the zombie has toughness, it provides a damage absorption limit effect.

[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_ICEYEARMONSTER_DESCRIPTION]  
After training in the Ice Age, it no longer fears red or explosive attacks.

[ACTIVITY_NEW_AUTUMN_HARVEST_TIPS]
Diamond Sharing Instructions
1. The base prize pool is 200,000 diamonds; for every player participating in the event, the prize pool increases by 50 diamonds for each draw.
2. Up to 10% of diamond rewards can be shared!

[ACTIVITY_NEW_AUTUMN_HARVEST_MAIN_TIPS]  
Activity Description  
1. Purchase gift packs to obtain Autumn Harvest Coins and win super prizes, including artifacts and a large number of diamonds!  
2. Up to 30 times for selected rewards and up to 90 times for Super Corn.  
3. Each time a player draws from the diamond pool, 50 diamonds are accumulated, with a maximum of 10% of the total diamonds to be shared!  
4. After the event ends, tokens will be converted to diamonds proportionally, with a conversion rate of 1 Autumn Harvest Coin to 30 diamonds, and 1 Super Corn to 500 diamonds.

[TOURISMOCTOBER_TASKDAY_TIPS_LABEL]
Daily Tasks

[TOURISMOCTOBER_TASK_TIPS_LABEL]
Monthly Tasks

[TOURISMOCTOBER_TASKDAY_TIPS_INFO]
Daily tasks refresh every day, with a maximum of 3069 tokens available!

[TOURISMOCTOBER_TASK_TIPS_INFO]
Monthly tasks last until October 31.

[TOURISMOCTOBER_MAIN_TIPS_INFO]
1. Players can obtain activity tokens by completing daily and monthly tasks.
2. Activity tokens can be exchanged for generous rewards in the exchange store, and tokens will not carry over to the next period.
3. Daily tasks refresh every day, while monthly tasks do not refresh and can only be completed once.
4. A team can have a maximum of three members; the first player to agree to let others join becomes the captain!
5. After joining a team, only the captain decides whether other players can join; those already in the team cannot fill in the invitation code again.
6. After team members complete tasks, other members can also receive the same amount of rewards!

[ZOMBIE_DARK_KING_ELITE]
Elite Dark King Zombie
[ZOMBIE_DARK_KING_ELITE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
The Elite Dark King Zombie has a resilience bar mechanism; physical attacks can reduce its resilience (stunning effects can cause high reductions). Emptying the resilience bar puts the zombie into a weakened state, during which the zombie will not act or attack until the resilience bar is fully restored. While the zombie has resilience, it provides damage absorption limits.

[ZOMBIE_DARK_KING_ELITE_DESCRIPTION]
In that dark age ruled by foolishness, generations of zombies struggled and finally discovered a way to use heavy gold to stun their monarch, thereby helping the monarch to sleep soundly. This great new era was called the Golden Age by zombie historians.

[ZOMBIE_DARK_WIZARD_ELITE]
Elite Dark Wizard Zombie
[ZOMBIE_DARK_WIZARD_ELITE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
The Elite Dark Wizard Zombie has a resilience bar mechanism; physical attacks can reduce its resilience (stunning effects can cause high reductions). Emptying the resilience bar puts the zombie into a weakened state, during which the zombie will not act or attack until the resilience bar is fully restored. While the zombie has resilience, it provides damage absorption limits.

[ZOMBIE_DARK_WIZARD_ELITE_DESCRIPTION]
At a certain wizard conference, a well-informed wizard zombie suggested that a magic book could be used to prop up a table corner. This shocked all the zombies present.
From then on, those who successfully learned this advanced technology became the elite among wizard zombies.

[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_MIRROR_QUEEN_PHASE3]
Elite Mirror Queen Zombie
[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_MIRROR_QUEEN_PHASE3_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
The Elite Mirror Queen Zombie has a resilience bar mechanism; physical attacks can reduce its resilience (stunning effects can cause high reductions). Emptying the resilience bar puts the zombie into a weakened state, during which the zombie will not act or attack until the resilience bar is fully restored. While the zombie has resilience, it provides damage absorption limits.

[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_MIRROR_QUEEN_PHASE3_DESCRIPTION]
The Mirror Queen Zombie spends a lot of time each day indulging in her reflection. She fantasizes that her reflection is stronger and more beautiful than she is now. One day, the mirror finally responded to the queen's wish.

[TOY_NIGHT_EXPIRED]
Toys' Wonderful Night Expired Rewards

[TOY_NIGHT_MAIN_TIPS_INFO]
Event Rules:
1. Purchase bundles to obtain Clockwork Tokens, which can be used to draw rewards in the event. Both Clockwork Tokens and Toy Parts cannot carry over to the next event. After the event ends, they will be converted to diamonds at a ratio of 1:10 and 1:1.
2. Each draw has a chance of obtaining Toy Parts or other rewards. Lucky players may directly receive the Gluttonous Snapdragon Super Outfit.
3. If no grand prize is drawn within 20 consecutive draws, the next draw will automatically come from the guaranteed prize pool.
4. If a duplicate outfit or avatar is drawn, it will automatically convert into 200 Toy Parts as a reward.

Guaranteed Prize Pool Odds:
Gluttonous Snapdragon Super Outfit: 2.22% Grand Prize
Toy Parts *1300: 2.78% Grand Prize
Toy Parts *700: 5.55% Grand Prize
Toy Parts *500: 11.10% Grand Prize
Diamonds *1888: 39.18% Grand Prize
Penny's Treasure Token *10: 39.18% Grand Prize

Reward Odds Announcement:
Gluttonous Snapdragon Super Outfit: 0.17% Grand Prize
Toy Parts *1300: 0.21% Grand Prize
Toy Parts *700: 0.43% Grand Prize
Toy Parts *500: 0.85% Grand Prize
Toy Parts *100: 3.00% Normal
Toy Parts *50: 5.00% Normal
Toy Parts *20: 12.00% Normal
Toy Parts *10: 36.00% Normal
Toys' Wonderful Night Avatar: 2.09% Normal
Turkey Pult Pacifier Outfit: 2.00% Normal
Outfit Token *500: 2.50% Normal
Outfit Token *100: 15.75% Normal
Penny's Treasure Token *1: 20.00% Normal
